programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Pirates (3-3, 1-1 American) aim to take advantage of the struggling Golden Hurricane (2-4, 0-3). Last season, East Carolina earned its first win over Tulsa since 2015 with a 38-31 decision. Katin Houser (ECU) threw for 314 yards in the victory.

programme.title: SportsCenter With Scott Van Pelt
programme.desc: SVP's up at midnight and bringing his unique perspective on games people play to "SportsCenter" viewers. The hourlong, late-night show is driven by the host's self-deprecating wit and passion for sports, with featured elements, including Van Pelt's nightly "1 Big Thing" commentary and a weekly look back at the moments that drove bettors wild in "Bad Beats." The show also delivers what "SportsCenter" fans are used to -- news and highlights, guests and interviews -- but in a different, fast-paced and insightful way.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: Live: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith hosts this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: Live: The Pat McAfee Show
programme.desc: Former NFL punter Pat McAfee brings his humor and candor to the microphone to highlight the day's top stories.

programme.title: Live: NBA Today

programme.title: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Cardinals (4-1, 1-1 ACC) try to bounce back against a tough foe in the No. 2 Hurricanes (5-0, 1-0). Louisville dropped its first game of the season in a 30-27 overtime decision versus Virginia on Oct. 4. Miami defeated Louisville 52-45 last year.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Tar Heels (2-3, 0-1 ACC) try to right the ship when they face the Golden Bears (4-2, 1-1). Bill Belichick's first conference game at the helm of North Carolina was one to forget, as Dabo Swinney's Clemson dismantled the Tar Heels 38-10 on Oct. 4.

programme.title: Live: College GameDay
programme.desc: Originating from the site of one of the day's best matchups, with a sea of fans cheering wildly in the background, host Rece Davis and analysts Lee Corso, Kirk Herbstreit and Desmond Howard talk college football for three hours, reporting on the top teams, games, players and storylines. David Pollack and Maria Taylor contribute reports, interviews and features. Davis replaced longtime host Chris Fowler in 2015.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 12 Yellow Jackets duke it out with the Blue Devils. Georgia Tech improved to 6-0 for the first time since 2011 after winning the Battle of the Techs with Virginia Tech on Oct. 11. Duke has scored 128 points during its three-game win streak.

programme.title: Live: College Football Scoreboard
programme.desc: All the latest news and analysis from the world of college football.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Razorbacks (2-4, 0-2 SEC) host the No. 4 Aggies (6-0, 3-0) for another edition of the Southwest Classic. Texas A&M has won 12 of the last 13 meetings after knocking off Arkansas 21-17 last year. Marcel Reed accounted for all three Aggies TDs.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: Arch Manning leads the No. 21 Longhorns (4-2, 1-1 SEC) into this outing with the Wildcats (2-3, 0-3). Manning threw for 166 yards and a TD when Texas stunned then-No. 6 Oklahoma in the Red River Rivalry on Oct. 11. Texas beat Kentucky 31-14 in 2024.

programme.desc: Presenting up-to-the-minute scores and highlights during the college football season.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Seminoles (3-3, 0-3 ACC) look to end their lengthy conference drought as they visit the Cardinal (2-4, 1-2). Florida State hasn't bested an ACC foe since topping Stanford's rival California 14-9 on Sept. 21, 2024, a run of eight straight losses.

programme.title: College Football Final
programme.desc: Once the day's slate of college football games is complete, ESPN recaps the action and discusses its implications on the top 25. Matt Barrie hosts with analysts Joey Galloway and Dan Mullen.

programme.title: NFL Matchup
programme.desc: An NFL Films production, "NFL Matchup" is definitely a show for football junkies. Unlike traditional football preview programs, this one gives fans an in-depth look at some of Sunday's games by breaking down the strategy and tactics -- the Xs and Os -- through the exclusive use of team-supplied footage. That type of film study is a forte of former NFL player and executive Louis Riddick and NFL Films producer Greg Cosell, whose work is featured here alongside host Sal Paolantonio.

programme.title: Live: Sunday NFL Countdown
programme.desc: This Sunday pregame staple debuted in 1985 and soon became a signature ESPN series. Host Mike Greenberg introduces the features and directs the storylines associated with the day's games, joined by a roster of analysts highlighted by ex-NFL players, coaches and executives including Tedy Bruschi, Randy Moss, Alex Smith, and Rex Ryan. Adam Schefter deliver breaking news and injury updates, while reporters at game sites set the scenes.

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Average Joe's Gym and its owner, Peter La Fleur (Vince Vaughn), are both down on their luck. A fancy competing gym called Globo-Gym, run by the maniacal health nut White Goodman (Ben Stiller), is about to put Average Joe's out of business unless Peter can raise $50,000 to keep his mortgage. To save the gym, Peter and a ragtag group of Average Joe's members and employees enter a dodgeball contest with a big cash prize. In response, White forms his own Globo-Gym team to rout the competition.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Unlike their heroic counterparts on the force, desk-bound NYPD detectives Gamble and Hoitz garner no headlines as they work day to day. Gamble relishes his job as a paper pusher, but Hoitz is itching to get back on the street and make a name for himself. When a seemingly minor case turns out to be a big deal, the two cops get the opportunity to finally prove to their comrades that they have the right stuff.

programme.title: Step Brothers

Their insane rivalry and narcissism pull the new family apart, forcing them to work together to reunite their parents.

programme.title: Tödliche Naturgewalten
programme.desc: Tornados sind ein außergewöhnliches Phänomen. In den rotierenden Säulen aus Luft kann der Wind Geschwindigkeiten von mehr als 480 Kilometern pro Stunde erreichen. Tornados wurden schon auf fast allen Kontinenten beobachtet, aber eine Region ist besonders betroffen: Die "Tornado Alley" in den USA verzeichnet Jahr für Jahr ungewöhnlich viele Tornados der verheerendsten Kategorie.

programme.title: Tödliche Naturgewalten
programme.desc: Nichts kann eine Schlammlawine aufhalten. Einmal ausgelöst, walzt sie erbarmungslos alles nieder. Drei Schlammlawinen in Kalifornien, Venezuela und Wales haben in der jüngeren Geschichte besonderes Entsetzen hervorgerufen, als sie teilweise ganze Landstriche unter sich begruben.

programme.title: Tödliche Naturgewalten
programme.desc: Die Pandemie ist der unsichtbare Killer: Eine verheerende Krankheitswelle, die um den ganzen Globus wandert, wird angesichts der Bevölkerungsentwicklung immer wahrscheinlicher. So unterschiedliche Krankheiten wie Ebola und die Schweinepest zeigen, dass jeder Kontinent unvermittelt betroffen sein kann. Gesundheitsexperten sind überzeugt, dass das Risiko für eine weltumspannende Epidemie steigt.

programme.title: Tödliche Naturgewalten
programme.desc: Neben Hungersnöten zählen Flutkatastrophen zu den humanitären Krisen mit den meisten Opfern der Geschichte. Eindrucksvolle Bilder zeigen die Ursachen anhand einiger der größten Überschwemmungen in jüngerer Zeit: Am Mississippi in den USA, an der Elbe in Deutschland und in New York City entfaltete sich die unaufhaltsame Gewalt großer Wassermassen.

programme.title: Tödliche Naturgewalten
programme.desc: Vulkane regen seit jeher unsere Fantasie an. Der tragische Untergang des römischen Pompeji übt bis heute eine morbide Faszination aus. Die Vorstellung schmelzenden Gesteins in feurigen Explosionen schürt Urängste und Alpträume. Vom italienischen Vesuv bis zum Kilauea auf Hawaii - schlafende und aktive Vulkane stellen eine immerwährende Bedrohung dar.

programme.title: Tödliche Naturgewalten
programme.desc: Länder wie Saudi-Arabien sind an Hitze über 40 Grad Celsius gewöhnt. Doch als 2010 eine Hitzewelle mit ähnlichen Temperaturen über Russland hereinbrach, starben geschätzt 56.000 Menschen. Und der europäische Supersommer 2003 hinterließ rund 70.000 Todesopfer. Außergewöhnliches Bildmaterial und Klimaspezialisten gewähren einen Einblick in die genauen Zusammenhänge der beiden Hitzekatastrophen.

programme.title: Tödliche Naturgewalten
programme.desc: Klirrende Kälte und beinharte Windböen kennzeichnen den Blizzard. Die Winterstürme sind Tötungsmaschinen der Natur. Sie bringen oft riesige Mengen Schnee - aber nicht immer, wie Wetterexperten erläutern. Am Beispiel zweier Blizzards an Nordamerikas Atlantikküste zeigen sie, welche Formen extreme Kälteeinbrüche annehmen können.

programme.title: Die weiße Gefahr
programme.desc: Die weiße Gefahr - Überfüllte Pistenautobahnen sind passé: Immer mehr Wintersportler verlassen trotz Lawinengefahr das ausgewiesene Skigebiet. Wie schnell sie ihren Leichtsinn mit dem Leben bezahlen können, ist vielen nicht bewusst. Dabei fordert der "weiße Rausch" allein in den Alpen jährlich etwa 120 Tote. Als größter Risikofaktor gilt der Mensch selbst...

programme.title: Vulkanismus in Deutschland
programme.desc: Der Geysir von Andernach ist mit über 60 Meter Höhe DIE Attraktion der Osteifel.

programme.title: Die letzten Schwammtaucher
programme.desc: Über Jahrhunderte war die griechische Insel Kalymnos Hochburg der Schwammtaucher. In der ganzen Welt galten sie als tollkühne Taucher mit erstaunlichem Lungenvolumen. Heute sterben die Schwämme im Mittelmeer. Umweltverschmutzung und Klimaerwärmung werden dafür verantwortlich gemacht. Wenn aber die Schwämme sterben, was wird dann aus den berühmten Schwammtauchern von Kalymnos?

programme.title: Die Schatzsucher von Ischia
programme.desc: Früher fuhren Giulio Lauro und sein Sohn Gaetano aufs Meer, um vor der Küste Ischias Fische zu fangen. Der Erlös reichte kaum zum Leben, das Geschäft lief mit der Zeit immer schlechter. Heute haben die Lauros keine Fische, sondern Touristen an Bord. Denn inzwischen spüren sie in der Bucht vor Ischia Ponte nicht Makrelen und Kalmare, sondern Artefakte der Antike auf.

programme.title: Survivalcamp
programme.desc: Wenn die Natur zur Herausforderung wird: Abenteuer-Fans lernen, wie man in der Wildnis überlebt.

programme.title: Tödliche Naturgewalten
programme.desc: Der japanische Ausdruck "Tsunami" bedeutet übersetzt "Welle im Hafen". Große Verwerfungen am Meeresgrund lösen diese tödlichen Überschwemmungen aus. Ein starkes Beben vor der Küste Japans verursachte 2011 einen enormen Tsunami. Doch die bisher verheerendste Flutwelle brach einen Tag nach Weihnachten 2004 über Südasien herein. Die Wassermassen hinterließen ein nie dagewesenes Maß an Zerstörung.

programme.title: Tödliche Naturgewalten
programme.desc: Einige der am dichtesten besiedelten Ballungsräume der Welt liegen in Erdbebengebieten. Tektonische Verwerfungen im Untergrund sind immer wieder seismisch aktiv - und tödlich. Mexico City erlebte auf den Tag genau 32 Jahre nach einem Megabeben eine erneute gewaltige Erschütterung. Erdbeben gehören zu den furchterregendsten Zerstörungskräften, die die Natur bereithält.

programme.title: Tödliche Naturgewalten
programme.desc: Sintflutartiger Regen, machtvoller Wind und riesige Wellen kennzeichnen die großen Wirbelstürme, die auf dem Meer entstehen. Der Hurrikan "Katrina" ging 2005 in die Geschichte ein: Als der Wirbelsturm an der Golfküste der USA auf Land traf, löste er eine traumatische Katastrophe aus. Hurrikan "Maria" zeigte 2017 auf Puerto Rico, welch unbarmherzige Gewalt die Natur entfesseln kann.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: In Tom's Roadhouse soll ein achtzigjähriger Ford ein paar PS zulegen, während die Porsche-Experten von 9elf einen äußerst seltenen Carrera 3.0 auf dem Weg zur erfolgreichen Hauptuntersuchung betreuen. Bei Il Motore steht ein Kellerfund vor der Entkernung: neuer Motor für einen alten Fiat 500. Eine top erhaltene DDR-Simson S50 findet ihren Weg zu den Spezialisten der Flying Classics.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Der Name ist Programm: Bei Il Motore dreht sich fast alles um Antriebsmaschinen. Minustemperaturen für die luftgekühlte Rarität von 9elf: Eisstrahlung beim Carrera 3.0. In der Halle der Flying Classics wartet ein schick überholtes Kultmoped auf die Abholung. Für eine Handvoll PS mehr muss sich der betagte Ford in Tom's Roadhouse von seinem Getriebe verabschieden.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Korrosion mit Coolnessfaktor: Auf dem Hof der Flying Classics landet eine Simson Schwalbe im Rost-Design. Die Porsche-Experten von 9elf verpassen dem frisch gestrahlten Carrera ein komplettes Check-up. In der Werkstatt von Il Motore wirkt strahlender Sand wahre Wunder. Motortausch für eine amerikanische Legende: In Tom's Roadhouse wartet ein Mustang auf seine neue Maschine.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Für den Carrera schlägt die Stunde der Wahrheit. Wird das edle Sammlerstück dem kritischen Prüfer-Blick standhalten? Der Il Motore-Chef jagt einen asiatischen Kultflitzer Marke Datsun auf den Leistungsstand. Geduldsprobe für den Vespa-Experten: Die Kupplung einer alten spanischen Vespa wird zum Problemfall. Auch die Montage des neuen Mustang-Motors wird zur kniffligen Herausforderung.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Das Team 9elf steigt um. Statt mit Porsche geben die PS-Experten im VW-Beetle Gas auf der Rennstrecke. Ein betagter Italiener muss sich beweisen. Läuft der bei Il Motore überholte Fiat-Motor problemlos? In Tom's Roadhouse bekommt das Ford-Hot Rod seine Achsen zurück. Wird die Problem-Kupplung der spanischen Vespa nach furioser Feinarbeit der Flying Classics wieder funktionieren?

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Beim Team 9elf treffen die langersehnten Edel-Felgen ein. Die Flying Classics bringen eine blaue Schwalbe auf Vordermann. Die Fachkenntnis des Il Motore-Teams ist ausnahmsweise bei einem Flugzeug-Oldie gefragt. Auch der Ford aus den 30er Jahren steht bei Tom's Roadhouse vor einer speziellen Premiere: Jungfernfahrt mit einem Gang mehr.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Ein Traumcabrio wartet bei Il Motore auf seine Motorrevision. Der Cadillac DeVille bringt die Fans von edlen Classic Cars zum Schwärmen. Das Team 9elf muss einen Porsche mit gestopften Rostlöchern durch die GTÜ-Prüfung bekommen. Außeneinsätze für die blaue Schwalbe bei den Flying Classics und den Mustang aus Tom's Roadhouse. Sind die Werkstatt-Eingriffe gut verlaufen?

programme.title: Klein aber fein
programme.desc: Der Airport der Nordseeinsel Sylt ist der nördlichste Verkehrsflughafen Deutschlands. In den Sommermonaten herrscht auf den zwei Start- und Landebahnen reger Flugbetrieb. Dann schlägt die große Stunde des kleinen, aber multifunktionalen Technikteams. Die Luftfahrt-Profis führen von der Einweisung der Maschinen, dem Be- und Entladen, der Betankung und Reinigung alles in Eigenregie durch.

programme.title: Gewürze
programme.desc: Überall auf der Welt werden Gewürze zum Aromatisieren von Speisen eingesetzt.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: In Tom's Roadhouse bekommt ein Oldie-VW-Bus aus Arizona eine Frischzellenkur, während bei Lundtauto in Berlin ein Porsche 911 aus den 1970er Jahren auf eine Komplettrestaurierung wartet. In der Werkstatt der Minis Hamburg kommen nur die britischen Originale auf die Hebebühne. Allein auf Motorroller und Mopeds mit Charakter haben sich die Flying Classics spezialisiert.

programme.desc: Dad tries to teach Bluey how to play chess, but Mom thinks she is still too young; Bingo helps Mom make an omelette for Dad's birthday; Lucky's Dad is outraged that modern Pass the Parcel has a present in every layer.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo play The Quiet Game; when Mum and Dad have a disagreement, Bluey makes Dad write a love letter to Mum; in the park, Bluey meets a new playmate, Winnie.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: The Heelers take turns remembering their favourite thing from the day; it's Dad's turn to give the kids breakfast and drop them off at school; Bingo promises to wake up in her own bed.

programme.title: SuperKitties
programme.desc: Bitsy eats too many treats and can't help the team stop Lab Rat.

programme.title: SuperKitties
programme.desc: SuperKitty superfan Pickles helps the team save the day; the SuperKitties stop Zsa-Zsa from turning the Kittydale water tower into her own giant bubble bath.

programme.title: Marvel's Spidey and His Amazing Friends
programme.desc: Team Spidey's webs won't work in hot weather and Peter's fix is no fix at all; when Peter glues himself to Gwen with his new web formula, the two of them need to adapt quickly.

programme.title: Marvel's Spidey and His Amazing Friends
programme.desc: Gobby and Rhino steal Lockjaw, a teleporting pup, in hopes of making him an accomplice; when Zola traps The Thing, Spidey and Ghost-Spider under a dome, Miles must save the day.

programme.title: Mickey Mouse Funhouse
programme.desc: Donald becomes distracted when he promises to play a game with Daisy; Mickey becomes too excited to listen to his friends' ideas when the gang searches for Cora's treasure.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: Derek has had a '55 Pontiac Chieftain waiting for a revival and he's keen to turn it into a tribute to the early days of NASCAR.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Red Line
programme.desc: New teams, new cars and new rules come together as the title of Fastest in America is up for grabs; eight captains each choose two drivers to compete in a 16-car bracket.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Red Line
programme.desc: The second night of racing commences with drivers competing on small tires and with flared tempers.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Red Line
programme.desc: The team captains enter week three ready to close the gap that stands between them and the Dream Team.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Red Line
programme.desc: Kye Kelley and his team try to make up for several nights of struggle as night four sees NOLA make big gains.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Red Line
programme.desc: Tricia returns and JJ tries a power move to put the MSO back on top for Night Five.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Red Line
programme.desc: Night Six is the last night of low-money rounds, and tensions are at an all-time high between Sherrybeth and Brett; Cali ends up in a brawl with Detroit.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Red Line
programme.desc: It's Night Seven and the cash prize has doubled; with this amount of cash up for grabs, everyone has a lot to lose.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Red Line
programme.desc: Night Eight sees Kye and his third-place NOLA call out Cali Nate in a huge 10K grudge race.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Red Line
programme.desc: On the final night of racing, only the best remain to vie for the crown of Fastest in America.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Worst Wrecks
programme.desc: The 405 returns for intense list racing; Big Chief struggles with PTSD following his horrendous crash.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Red Line
programme.desc: Chaos erupts among Bracket One's 64 small-tire racers when the light malfunctions on the first race, increasing the danger on the tricky roads.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Mega Cash Days
programme.desc: Bracket 1's losers return for a second chance to win $100,000; past winners Kye Kelley and Daddy Dave try to stay alive, JJ da Boss feels the pressure to win like his Memphis teammates and Cali Nate tries to live up to his reputation.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Mega Cash Days
programme.desc: A fresh round of racers competes in bracket 2, including two champs -- Mega Cash Days winner Brandon James and No Prep Kings 3-time champion Ryan Martin; the event heats up when racers make it clear that nice guys don't win races.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Red Line
programme.desc: Street racers battle at rough, untested tracks across the country and earn points depending on how they perform.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.desc: The '73 Chevy step-side muscle truck has a storied history; Freiburger and guest host Dave Chappelle fabricate another chapter in the truck's saga with the addition of a beefy four-link suspension and coilovers to hopefully get it to sit right.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.desc: Freiburger and Dulcich add 1,000+ hp to David's Pro Street 1969 Chevy Nova; in an attempt to make a true street/strip car, the guys fully build out this roller before taking it to the track to run some impressive times out of the gate.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.desc: Freiburger and Dulcich return the '67 Crusher Camaro to its original styling, then hit the road to Vegas and back for Hot Rod's first-ever Power Tour West.

programme.title: Texas Metal's Loud and Lifted
programme.desc: The 1991 Land Rover Defender is known for ruggedness and simplicity; Mod Mafia does a reboot of a tired, old Defender with modern performance, power and custom luxury; Wide Open Garage takes an old-school Bronco monster truck into overdrive.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: The guys set out to build a 1,000-hp street car using a 2014 Caprice police patrol car, a 5.3 LS, and a turbo big enough for three cars; Tony is on the East Coast building the giant turbo system.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.desc: The Hilton Head Concours d'Elegance in South Carolina; rust treatment and prevention.

programme.title: Sam's Garage
programme.desc: Join master mechanic Sam Mahdavi for new projects, repairs and the best parts on the market.

programme.title: Two Guys Garage
programme.desc: Willie B and Kevin Byrd rescue a classic Dodge D150, repairing rust, refreshing its look, and prepping the drivetrain, before dropping in a late-model carbureted Hemi with a Tremec transmission to build the ultimate budget-friendly tow rig.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Tony and Lucky try to turn a 2014 Chevy Caprice PPV into an insanely powerful street car making over 1,000 horsepower; they take a 5.3 LS engine, bolt on a giant turbocharger, and then let them sing.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Tony and Lucky completely revamp just about everything on the 1927-ish Ford T-bucket truck; brakes, frame, steering, suspension, even the engine gets a sweet-looking 3x2 carburetor setup for primo old-school looks and performance.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Putting a 401 AMC V8 engine into a crusty 1974 Javelin; pairing the V8 with a proper four-speed Super T-10 transmission, long-tube headers, and a ton of other parts.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: After months of agony searching for overpriced projects, Tony decides it's time to sell something; the most complete car is a 1974 454-powered Chevy Corvette wearing a custom 1969 wide body and killer paint.

programme.title: Build for Off-Road
programme.desc: A sunbaked Jeep JK tub is reborn as a no-holds-barred, Southern-style throwdown buggy. Ian begins with a custom chassis to cradle massive axles, long-tube suspension, and towering 40-inch tires -- all backed by big horsepower and an even bigger attitude.

programme.title: Build for Off-Road
programme.desc: For part 2 of Ian's southern-style JK buggy build, he builds out monster axles to handle the kind of abuse only 40-inch tires can dish out. Sparks fly as he cuts and clears the inner fender wells, making room for all that rubber and travel.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: David and Mike mix the He Hate Me '66 Ford Econoline with a 500ci front-wheel-drive powertrain donated (stolen) from Dirt Every Day's twin-engine 4x4 Eldorado, to create the Econorado; Finnegan takes the Blasphemi to the NHRA Winternationals.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: David and Mike consider themselves masters of burnout-ology; yet they have never actually entered a burnout competition until now; they take a rusted-out '76 Camaro and set out across Texas to show how to scientifically get the best burnouts.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: David and Mike take a 1964 Ford Galaxie 500 XL that absolutely needed to be rescued; after a few miles, the car begins to smoke worse than any car in the history of Roadkill.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: David and Mike find beaters under $3K; it's a four-vehicle shootout with Chevy vs. Ford, truck vs. car, and old vs. newer; Freiburger chose a 2006 Crown Vic and a 1999 Chevy S-10; Finnegan went vintage with a 1972 Ford Maverick and a 1976 Chevy LUV.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: A Chevy-powered '74 Jaguar XJ12 needs a new engine, and in homage to a previous fiasco, the guys return to a parking lot in Sparks, Nevada, for the swap. Then, they follow a lead to fill the void left by the stolen "Mazdarati.".

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Mike and David drive a new car every day as they trade their way through the 25th Hot Rod Power Tour; each day, they'll swap their junk for someone else's and try to make it to the next stop on the tour.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Steve finds a '71 Pontiac T-37 at a junkyard in Idaho; Mike and David take their time reviving a motor that's been sitting for 38 years.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Mike Finnegan and Tony Angelo buy a mid-1970s Chevy LUV mini-truck and hit the road, enduring electrical problems, torrential downpours, water in the engine, and floods.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: David and Mike take the show back to its roots, but take things to new heights with a bigger map and a four-door Dart; they'll see how the 2013 version stacks against the '76 318-powered Dodge that started it all.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: David and Mike bring their best Dodge project cars out to the M1 Concourse for the annual Roadkill Nights event in Pontiac, Mich.; this time, it's a road course, skidpad and drag racing with seven favorite projects.

programme.desc: Mike, Tony and the '55 Chevy race for glory in a brutal five-day test for drag-racing, street-driven cars; Blasphemi is know for three things, going fast, being awesome and breaking apart.

programme.title: Texas Metal's Loud and Lifted
programme.desc: Wide Open Garage's mega-truck build gets even bigger as they take an old-school '82 C10 square body and create a one-of-one show truck, monster truck; one Way Diesel Performance lives up to their name by giving an '88 Silverado more than 1,200 horsepower.

programme.title: Texas Metal's Loud and Lifted
programme.desc: 1 Way Diesel Performance is thrown a mega-curveball with a classic '48 Dodge Power Wagon. In a race pitting garage vs. garage, a 2,700hp diesel truck hits the line against a turbocharged first-generation Camaro.

programme.title: LOKAR Car Show
programme.desc: The return of the iconic NOPI Show features their first regional car show and drift event at Lanier Raceway.

programme.title: Motorhead Garage
programme.desc: If it goes, Dave Dobson and the Motorhead Garage crew are fans. They bring you their love for all things motorized as they modify cars, trucks, ATVs and motorcycles using aftermarket equipment, ranging from the tried-and-true to the innovative and new.

programme.title: Build for Off-Road
programme.desc: A sunbaked Jeep JK tub is reborn as a no-holds-barred, Southern-style throwdown buggy. Ian begins with a custom chassis to cradle massive axles, long-tube suspension, and towering 40-inch tires -- all backed by big horsepower and an even bigger attitude.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Good things come in small packages, and this 1967 Fiat fits the bill; Dave is excited by a new challenge; the build sheet includes making it a wide body, a more powerful engine, custom fender flares and more.

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: As a how-to show dedicated exclusively to trucks, 4x4s and SUVs, Truck U finds monster-truck expert Matt Steele and master mechanic Bruno Massel involved in hands-on projects crucial to serious off-roading and truck performance.

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: It is Matt and Bruno's turn to do some upgrades on Willie B's CJ-7 that will be headed out to California on the Build for Off Road Adventure. We work on the gears and axles, as well as give it a custom set of bead locks.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: The Bronco's owner is lukewarm on Dave's radical idea for the interior; Dave must resist going too far with this build so they can actually enjoy it on dirt roads without feeling like they're beating up a museum piece.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave Kindig, owner and operator of Kindig-It Design, turns out one-of-a-kind vehicles for his demanding (and sometimes famous) clientele. Working on all types and periods of cars, we'll see cars rendered, designed, built and restored from the ground up.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave has been interested in dipping his feet in the electric car world, and with his CF1s providing the perfect canvas, he's decided to take the plunge. Turning this into reality will take a new level of engineering and learning a new automotive language.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave has a soft spot for all kids in need; so when a car show in Oregon that benefits the local children's charity called, Dave eagerly said yes; the guys take the rig to the show; there's a rumor that Kev may actually get a spot in the drag races.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: One of KevDogg's favorite cars has arrived in the form of a stock post Bel Air, and he will lead the charge on the build; when Kev's pride and joy takes a turn for the worse, he enlists the help of a local dealer to help him get back on the road.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Entertainer and car collector Kevin Hart's latest project is in the shop, and every square inch of the car is getting customized, from a futuristic front and rear end redesign to subtle but huge changes to the rear window and fenders.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: The fabrication for Kevin Hart's Challenger is complete, and now Dave is taking his futuristic theme into the dash and interior; a new custom color, flawless body work and seamless assembly are in store for this client who expects perfection.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: In high school, Dave's wife Charity drove the wheels off her '67 Chevelle; when the couple started their business, they sold the car with the hopes of one day getting another; the crew works to get it ready.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: The Chevelle makes it through paint and into the assembly area, where it comes back to life; new upholstery gives the car the real upgrade it needs, and just like that, Dave is the hero of the family again.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: It's no secret that while Kev can appreciate cars of all shapes and sizes; deep down, he's a truck guy; when a truck show comes through town, KevDogg shows Dave what is what with all the great builds that have descended on Salt Lake.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Since launching the project in 2021, Dave Kindig's CF1 has been a smashing success; never one to rest on his laurels, Dave has decided it's time to move on to the next generation of the car, and this one will be adding the option of a Carson top.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave's latest client wants him to outlaw a Porsche 356 A, which means a ton of modifications, including smoothed-out bumpers, louvered deck lid, through-the-hood fuel filler and more; but this will be a Bitchin' Outlaw and have the Kindig touch.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: It's no secret that while Kev can appreciate cars of all shapes and sizes; deep down, he's a truck guy; when a truck show comes through town, KevDogg shows Dave what is what with all the great builds that have descended on Salt Lake.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harry's long lost daughter, and Lloyd's in love again.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An unconventional sleuth attempts to find a football team's stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two inseparable best friends navigate the last weeks of high school and are invited to a gigantic house party. Together with their nerdy friend, they spend a long day trying to score enough alcohol to supply the party and inebriate two girls in order to kick-start their sex lives before they go off to college. Their quest is complicated after one of them falls in with two inept cops who are determined to show him a good time.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friend's wedding in Singapore. She's also surprised to learn that Nick's family is extremely wealthy and he's considered one of the country's most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nick's disapproving mother.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Foregone Conclusion.' However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now' style documentary.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, they've hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Axel Foley and his Beverly Hills buddies investigate criminal activities at a Southern California amusement park.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters who have attacked New York.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: A girl who's sick of the social strictures of junior high is transformed into a grownup overnight. In this feel-good fairy tale, teenager Jenna wants a boyfriend, and when she's unable to find one, she fantasizes about being a well-adjusted adult. Suddenly, her secret desire becomes a reality, and she is transformed into a 30-year-old. However, adulthood, with its own set of male-female challenges, isn't as easy as it looks.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In 1960s London, an aimless, amoral young man exploits the women with whom he becomes intimately involved, until something happens to make him reconsider his existence.

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies', everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Playboy vet Henry sets his heart on romancing Lucy, but she has short-term memory loss and can't remember anything that happened the day before. So every morning, Henry has to woo her again. Her friends and family are very protective, and Henry must convince them that he's in it for love.

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: When John Bennett was a little boy, he made a wish that Ted, his beloved teddy bear, would come alive. Thirty years later, foul-mouthed Ted is still John's constant companion, much to the chagrin of Lori, John's girlfriend. Though Lori's displeasure is exacerbated by the pair's constant consumption of beer and weed, she's not the one who's most disappointed with John; it may take the intervention of John's boyhood toy to help him grow up at last.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys'. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each other's throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Army's New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking' Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Paul's athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a plot by a dangerous criminal organisation endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesn't need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Foregone Conclusion.' However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now' style documentary.

programme.title: You've Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistler's Mother' painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mr Bean's Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesn't go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he can't skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his gran's house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he can't putt and the golfing establishment aren't happy to have him around.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that he is about to cause.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Parenting and marriage is becoming tougher and tougher for Toula and her husband Ian. Not only has their relationship lost some of its spark, but they're also dealing with a rebellious teenage daughter who clashes with Greek traditions. On top of that, Toula must contend with aging parents and the endless needs of cousins and friends. When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harry's long lost daughter, and Lloyd's in love again.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistler's Mother' painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mr Bean's Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesn't go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a plot by a dangerous criminal organisation endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesn't need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friend's wedding in Singapore. She's also surprised to learn that Nick's family is extremely wealthy and he's considered one of the country's most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nick's disapproving mother.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, they've hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters who have attacked New York.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Parenting and marriage is becoming tougher and tougher for Toula and her husband Ian. Not only has their relationship lost some of its spark, but they're also dealing with a rebellious teenage daughter who clashes with Greek traditions. On top of that, Toula must contend with aging parents and the endless needs of cousins and friends. When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncle's company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds' inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Rumours
programme.desc: Leaders of the world's wealthiest democracies become spectacles of incompetence, contending with increasingly surreal obstacles as night falls in the misty woods and they realise they are suddenly alone.

programme.title: Heaven Can Wait
programme.desc: An American footballer is given the body of a wealthy industrialist after an inept angel prematurely claims his life.

programme.title: Kingpin
programme.desc: An ex-professional bowler and his talented Amish protégé hustle their way across the country to a big-money tournament.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Billy is the son of hotel chain magnate Brian Madison and expects to inherit the family fortune, but he's shocked when his father stipulates he won't unless he passes 12th grade in just 24 weeks. It will be tough, since he never passed 1st grade. Determined to prove his father wrong, Billy enrols at school.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Parenting and marriage is becoming tougher and tougher for Toula and her husband Ian. Not only has their relationship lost some of its spark, but they're also dealing with a rebellious teenage daughter who clashes with Greek traditions. On top of that, Toula must contend with aging parents and the endless needs of cousins and friends. When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.desc: An uncouth FBI agent goes undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant as a contestant to flush out a terrorist who plans to bomb the event. The hard-nosed cop, who prides herself on her toughness, must discard her trainers and feminise her behaviour if she is to avoid blowing her cover.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie is given another makeover to become the face of the Bureau, prior to embarking on a promotional tour. When two of her friends are kidnapped - Miss USA and a beauty pageant director - she decides to investigate on her own, in defiance of orders to the contrary.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, they've hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Friendship's Death
programme.desc: A British reporter meets female robot Friendship, who has been sent from another planet to war-torn 1970 Jordan.

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: Visually arresting thriller about a researcher who uses a mentally disabled gardener for ill-advised experiments in inducing mental development through virtual reality simulations. At first, the simulations seem to enhance the lawnmower man's mental powers, but then the experiment goes haywire. Based on a short story by Stephen King.

programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: In the near future, industrial espionage of information systems is so rife, couriers have the information transmitted into implants in their brain that can hold gigabytes of information. Johnny Mnemonic is one of these couriers who's doubled his capacity to a dangerous 180 gigabytes and if he doesn't download in 24 hours, he'll die. Unfortunately, a gang of Japanese Yakuza mobsters are after what's in his head.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: Working for a highly funded yet unofficial government agency, Kay and Jay are the Men in Black, providers of immigration services and regulators of all things alien on Earth. While investigating a series of unregistered close encounters, the MIB agents uncover the deadly plot of an intergalactic terrorist who is on a mission to assassinate two ambassadors from opposing galaxies currently in residence in New York City.

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: Frustrated writer Jack Torrance takes a job as the winter caretaker at the ominous, mountain-locked Overlook Hotel so that he can write in peace. When he arrives there with his wife and son, they learn that the previous caretaker had gone mad. Slowly Jack becomes possessed by the evil, demonic presence in the hotel. Based on the book by Stephen King.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
programme.desc: Count Dracula, a 15th-century prince, is condemned to live off the blood of the living for eternity. Young lawyer Jonathan Harker is sent to Dracula's castle to finalise a land deal, but when the Count sees a photo of Harker's fiancée, Mina, the spitting image of his dead wife, he imprisons him and sets off for London to track her down.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: Cinema List: Thrilling Thriller
programme.desc: Send your heart racing with these masterful thrillers creating tension so thick you could cut it, from 70s hit `The China Syndrome' to M Night Shyamalan's 2024 blockbuster `Trap'.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: A teenage girl wants revenge on the man who killed her father, but she needs help from legendary one-eyed marshal `Rooster' Cogburn, and a Texas Ranger.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthor's nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone' in the first `Superman' movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helplessly.

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Clark Kent's class reunion is disrupted when a villain forces a computer genius to help destroy Superman.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Weather scientists Jo and Bill put marital problems aside to track a slew of devastating tornadoes raging through Oklahoma and stay one step ahead of their better-equipped but arrogant rivals. They have to get to the tornado first to be able to test a radical new device, by inserting it directly into the heart of the storm.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Scary chiller about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. However, when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant great white shark, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again.

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Another great white shark arrives to terrorise the holiday resort of Amity Island. Having recovered from the grisly events of four years ago, the island is once again packed with tourists. Families are sailing in the bay and swimming off the beach, but when two divers and a water-skier go missing, the local police chief fears that he is about to relive his greatest nightmare.

programme.title: Jaws III
programme.desc: Second sequel to Steven Spielberg's 1970s blockbuster transports the action from Amity Island to a new undersea kingdom attraction in a Florida theme park. The capture of a baby great white shark is big news and brings crowds to the park - until its mother arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: Visually arresting thriller about a researcher who uses a mentally disabled gardener for ill-advised experiments in inducing mental development through virtual reality simulations. At first, the simulations seem to enhance the lawnmower man's mental powers, but then the experiment goes haywire. Based on a short story by Stephen King.

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: Biopic nominated for five Oscars. The story of Dian Fossey, the conservationist who battled poachers and red tape for 20 years to save a species, including her relationship with photographer Bob Campbell and her tragic murder.

programme.title: ...And Justice for All
programme.desc: An idealistic lawyer who attempts to win cases for clients trapped in a corrupt and hypocritical legal system finds himself defending a self-righteous and venal judge accused of rape.

programme.title: Birdy
programme.desc: A soldier returns from Vietnam to find his boyhood friend, also a fellow soldier, in a military hospital, having suffered a mental breakdown in which he has become detached from reality and imagines that he is a bird.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Weather scientists Jo and Bill put marital problems aside to track a slew of devastating tornadoes raging through Oklahoma and stay one step ahead of their better-equipped but arrogant rivals. They have to get to the tornado first to be able to test a radical new device, by inserting it directly into the heart of the storm.

programme.title: Jaws

However, when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant great white shark, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Effects-laden blockbuster about a huge reptile which emerges from the sea to wreak havoc in Manhattan. On a research trip to Chernobyl, a young scientist discovers a startling link between genetic mutation and radioactivity. When a fishing trawler is attacked by an unseen creature, and other evidence of a massive reptilian creature is unearthed, he realises that the creature is following a destructive path to New York.

programme.title: Lake Placid
programme.desc: Following the death of a local diver, a New York palaeontologist is sent out to help the local fisheries warden investigate the case.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: The curse of an ancient mummy protects buried treasure in the Egyptian desert. An American mercenary who knows of the secret location is rescued from a Cairo prison by an English historian and her brother, and together they set off on a hunt. Along the way, the trio encounter flesh-eating scarab beetles, killer sandstorms, and reincarnated demons.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. He's blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university. Yo help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over Thanksgiving. Frank's niece says this will be easy money, but she didn't foresee Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: A teenage girl wants revenge on the man who killed her father, but she needs help from legendary one-eyed marshal `Rooster' Cogburn, and a Texas Ranger.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Scientist Karen Ross is sent by her father-in-law, mogul RB Travis, to the Congo to determine the whereabouts of his son's missing diamond-hunting team. Led by expert guide Kelly, Ross and a mismatched search party including scientist Dr Peter Elliot, treasure hunter Herkermer Homolka and a gorilla, discover a danger far more sinister than anything they expected to find, even in the heart of the jungle.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: A whimsical but engaging western about a drifter who saves a woman from a gang of marauders. The cowboy is astonished to learn that the woman is a nun, especially when he witnesses her heavy drinking and cigar-smoking ways. The unlikely pair embarks on a voyage of discovery as they become embroiled in the Mexican War.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: The curse of an ancient mummy protects buried treasure in the Egyptian desert. An American mercenary who knows of the secret location is rescued from a Cairo prison by an English historian and her brother, and together they set off on a hunt. Along the way, the trio encounter flesh-eating scarab beetles, killer sandstorms, and reincarnated demons.

programme.title: Lake Placid
programme.desc: Following the death of a local diver, a New York palaeontologist is sent out to help the local fisheries warden investigate the case.

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: After being kicked out of his apartment by his girlfriend, Steven hears that if he slips a cable guy $50, he can get hooked up with free cable - but at what further cost? Can Steven gently reject the cable guy's insane attempts to be best buds and also get his girlfriend back?

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: Heaven Can Wait
programme.desc: An American footballer is given the body of a wealthy industrialist after an inept angel prematurely claims his life.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once he's had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newton's wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Dumb & Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owner's kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Brewster's Millions
programme.desc: After losing his position as a minor-league pitcher, Montgomery Brewster learns his great-uncle has left him 300 million dollars. To inherit it, Brewster must spend 30 million in 30 days under a complicated set of rules that forbid him from donating too much to charity or retaining any new assets when the period is up. Unable to share details about the will's odd conditions with anyone, Brewster sets out to spend his money under the stern eye of paralegal Angela Drake.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keeper's son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In 1960s London, an aimless, amoral young man exploits the women with whom he becomes intimately involved, until something happens to make him reconsider his existence.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who specialises in missing children is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan child from evil forces.

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: After being kicked out of his apartment by his girlfriend, Steven hears that if he slips a cable guy $50, he can get hooked up with free cable - but at what further cost? Can Steven gently reject the cable guy's insane attempts to be best buds and also get his girlfriend back?

programme.title: Billy Madison

It will be tough, since he never passed 1st grade. Determined to prove his father wrong, Billy enrols at school.

programme.title: Junior
programme.desc: A research scientist becomes the world's first pregnant man in order to test a drug he and a colleague have designed for expectant women. To carry out the trial, he has an embryo implant, believing that he will only carry the baby for three months - hardly expecting to face the prospect of giving birth.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he can't skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his gran's house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he can't putt and the golfing establishment aren't happy to have him around.

programme.title: Wayne's World
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth battle an evil TV producer in this big-screen adaptation of the `Saturday Night Live' skit.

programme.title: Wayne's World 2
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth decide to stage a rock festival. After losing his late-night cable show, Wayne has a dream in which Jim Morrison tells him to put on a massive music festival - Waynestock. Before this can be achieved, the budding promoters must overcome several hurdles and sort out their turbulent love lives.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountant's trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier's new boss (Alan Tudyk) buys a condo in Frasier's building and then copies his interior design.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Chef and restaurateur Marcus Samuelsson goes undercover at a public cooking class, a culinary institute, a high-end food truck and a soup kitchen to find and mentor new culinary talent.

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary [NEW]
programme.desc: Channel 4's midday news summary.

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: In Spain, two B&B owners hear wedding bells. In Portugal, a couple running a guest house welcome their first trial guests. And in Italy, two vineyard owners begin harvesting their grapes by hand.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Simon O'Brien and Max McMurdo head to Herefordshire to meet George, who has been collecting for more than 70 years. Max finds a crate of vintage motor oil bottles that he thinks could be worth a small fortune.

programme.title: Countdown [NEW]
programme.desc: Colin Murray, Rachel Riley and Susie Dent host, with Ade Adepitan in Dictionary Corner, as contestants race against the clock to pit their wits against vowels, consonants and numbers.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jean Johansson is in Málaga to help fitness instructor Lucy find the perfect place. She's been thinking about buying a home abroad since she was 16 and is now ready to take the plunge. Jean has five great options for Lucy's budget of £100,000.

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village [NEW]
programme.desc: Louise and Paul approach the completion of their village as they finish off their dream home, while Tracey and Budo celebrate their kitchen build coming to an end. In Spain, Ben and Susana's plans for their upper village move `upper' gear.

programme.title: Four in a Bed [NEW]
programme.desc: On payment day, the B&Bers clash over furniture failings and clock complaints. And sparks fly, rather ironically, over a lack of electricity.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Celebrating 20 amazing years of dinner party debauchery. Fishmonger Bernadette hopes to spread some love on the final night in Glasgow, with her curious Italian-themed menu. Saoirse has an unexpected dip in Bernadette's hot tub.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun [NEW]
programme.desc: Moto GP fan Jackie and her daughter Tayla are looking for a holiday home in the countryside around the Spanish city of Valencia. Popular for its fascinating architecture and restaurant-lined squares, Valencia is a vibrant city.

programme.title: Channel 4 News [NEW]
programme.desc: Channel 4's flagship news programme. With sport and weather.

This show is the first to ever attempt to chronicle an entire life without offering even the slightest insight into the human condition, every significant incident forensically removed to leave only the lean meat of the trivial.

programme.desc: Gizelle honours her father, Ashley gives a major life update and Dr. Wendy goes to the White House; Karen's latest court date looms as she questions her friendships; Stacey's charity event unravels in an unexpected fashion.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey
programme.desc: Rachel and Jen Fessler sit down for a tense discussion; Jennifer hosts a birthday party for her new puppy, Biscuit; the Gorgas cope with the reality of Antonia growing up; Dolores hosts her annual charity softball game.

programme.title: Celebrity Catchphrase
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts as Ben Bailey Smith, Claire Richards, and Lisa Riley all try to guess well-known phrases from animated clues. If they can 'say what they see', they could get the chance to win 50,000 pounds for their chosen charity.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts as Carol gets her chance to open the iconic red boxes. In the game show with only one question, Carol may say "Deal" or "No Deal" when faced with the Banker's cash offers or instead choose to take home what's inside her box.

programme.title: The 1% Club
programme.desc: Lee Mack presents the game show where the questions aren't about general knowledge but logic, brainpower and common sense. 100 contestants begin each edition, who'll face the final question, which only 1 per cent of the population can get right.

programme.title: Big Brother [NEW]
programme.desc: A new cast of carefully selected housemates from all walks of life will take up residence in the world's most famous reality TV home for up to six weeks, with cameras capturing their every move and the nation following every twist and turn.

programme.title: Big Brother: Late and Live [NEW]
programme.desc: Filmed at the Big Brother house in front of a live studio audience, the go-to destination for the first live interviews with evictees, exclusive camera run access, celebrity guest commentary, debates, and weekly nomination results.

programme.title: Family Guy

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: At his high school reunion, Peter pretends to be a big-shot millionaire to impress his classmates, but the truth comes out when he meets Tom Brady and loses all self-control.

programme.title: American Dad!
