programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon Taffer heads to Margate, Florida, to fix a dive bar whose owners have not changed anything in the bar for over 20 years, including their smoking policy.

programme.title: Inside Edition
programme.desc: A syndicated newsmagazine includes investigative reports, interviews with newsmakers, human interest stories, and celebrity and pop-culture features. The long-running series, which premiered in 1989, is currently anchored by Eva Pilgrim. Prior to Pilgrim taking the helm, the show was anchored by Deborah Norville and, earlier, by former Fox News mainstay Bill O'Reilly.

programme.title: Entertainment Tonight
programme.desc: Each episode gives viewers an inside look at television, film and music, including interviews with each industry's biggest stars. Over the years, many celebrities have "broken their silence" regarding various scandals or tragedies with hosts and correspondents from "ET." In addition to covering breaking news, the show visits sets of movies and TV shows and heads to the red carpet to cover awards shows and other major events. Airing daily since 1981, "Entertainment Tonight" is the template by which many other entertainment newsmagazines are based.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: A cockroach infestation plagues a grotesque rock bar in Austin, Texas.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon visits Pat's Cocktails, a run-down sports bar in California, where the bar manager is too busy canoodling with his wife to notice what is going on around him.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: After the tragic loss of his mother, the owner of this British pub has coped poorly by drinking away profits and gambling his way to ruin with weekly poker tournaments.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: A retired professional baseball player now owns a bar and his intoxicated staff gives away his profits; Jon Taffer tries to save his business before he is forced to retire a second time.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon Taffer tries to convince the ultimate maternal figure to make her decisions like a business owner to save her struggling Las Vegas dive bar from closing its doors.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon Taffer must turn an aspiring musician into a responsible bar owner if he's going to save a roadhouse and a marriage.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Two absentee owners who see their bar as more of an investment than a business refuse to engage with the staff or customers until Jon Taffer intervenes.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon attempts to rescue a bar owner in Loveland, Colo., who is on the verge of losing his business and his marriage.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon Taffer travels to Worden, IL to rescue a bar for an owner who inherited the business from his father but relies on an untrained manager to secure its future success.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Charlie tries to sweet talk Judith's divorcee support-group into letting Jake continue to spend weekends at his place.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: A pregnancy scare has Charlie heading to the doctor for a vasectomy.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Alan learns that Charlie belongs to an exclusive men's group, and he begs his brother to let him join.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Judith is dating Jake's pediatrician (Ryan Stiles), and Alan is upset until Charlie points out that if she remarries, his alimony payments will end.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Charlie tries to save Jake from school suspension by romancing his teacher, but the results are unfortunate.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Charlie's mother, Evelyn, asks to borrow his Mercedes so she can impress a Saudi prince who she wants to buy real estate.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Charlie meets his match when he falls for a woman who is better at playing hard to get than he is.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Alan denies having shoplifted a toy as a child and fears he has a dark side, until Charlie admits he planted the toy on Alan to stay out of trouble himself.

programme.title: Step Brothers
programme.desc: Brennan Huff (Will Ferrell) and Dale Doback (John C. Reilly) have one thing in common: they are both lazy, unemployed leeches who still live with their parents. When Brennan's mother and Dale's father marry and move in together, it turns the overgrown boys' world upside down. Their insane rivalry and narcissism pull the new family apart, forcing them to work together to reunite their parents.

programme.title: 21 Jump Street
programme.desc: When cops Schmidt (Jonah Hill) and Jenko (Channing Tatum) join the secret Jump Street unit, they use their youthful appearances to go under cover as high-school students. They trade in their guns and badges for backpacks, and set out to shut down a dangerous drug ring. But, as time goes on, Schmidt and Jenko discover that high school is nothing like it was just a few years earlier -- and, what's more, they must again confront the teenage terror and anxiety they thought they had left behind.

programme.title: 22 Jump Street
programme.desc: Although they made their way through high school successfully, an investigation at a local college brings big changes for undercover officers Jenko (Channing Tatum) and Schmidt (Jonah Hill). When Jenko meets a kindred spirit on the football team and Schmidt infiltrates the bohemian art-major scene, both men begin to question their partnership. Not only do they have to crack the case, but now the two overgrown adolescents must learn how to behave like adults.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Mixologist Phil Wills rescues a filthy bar in Oxnard, Calif.; helping a newlywed couple realize their dream.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Swanky Bubbles is a failing champagne bar in Philadelphia.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: A twerking, drinking, fighting staff threatens a once-thriving bar, leaving Ashley and Robert Gaddy's future at crossroads.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon helps a struggling owner take a step back so that his apprehensive manager can take a step forward.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon goes to work on a bar in the deep south run by a family from New York who make the waitresses dress provocatively and have a menu of sixty items, only five of which sell.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs goes to Mexico to confront a drug cartel intent on revenge; Gibbs has to make a devastating decision.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs must take desperate measures to protect his loved ones with Paloma Reynosa still on the loose.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A girl's kidnapping turns into something bigger when her grandfather complicates the investigation.

programme.title: Dirty Grandpa
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Jason Kelly is one week away from marrying his boss's controlling daughter, putting him on the fast track for a partnership at his firm. Tricked by his grandfather Dick, Jason finds himself driving the foulmouthed old man to Daytona Beach, Fla., for a wild spring break that includes frat parties, bar fights and a night of karaoke. While Jason worries about the upcoming wedding, Dick tries to show his grandson how to live life to the fullest.

programme.title: 21 Jump Street
programme.desc: When cops Schmidt (Jonah Hill) and Jenko (Channing Tatum) join the secret Jump Street unit, they use their youthful appearances to go under cover as high-school students. programme.title: The Hangover Part II
programme.desc: Two years after the disastrous events in Las Vegas, it is now Stu's (Ed Helms) turn to walk down the aisle. Since his bride is from Thailand, Stu decides to hold the wedding there. Desperately hoping to avoid the mayhem of Doug's (Justin Bartha) bachelor party, Stu chooses what he thinks will be a safe option: an alcohol-free, prewedding brunch. But this being Thailand, and with Phil (Bradley Cooper) and Alan (Zach Galifianakis) again in attendance, anything can happen.

programme.title: The Hangover Part III
programme.desc: It's been two years since the gang known as the Wolfpack narrowly escaped disaster in Bangkok. Now, Phil (Bradley Cooper), Stu (Ed Helms) and Doug (Justin Bartha) have happy lives at home -- but Alan (Zach Galifianakis) doesn't. Still lacking contentment and a sense of purpose, Alan has gone off his meds and surrendered to his natural impulses. It's up to the other members of the Wolfpack to get him through his personal crisis by embarking on a road trip to the place it all began: Las Vegas.

programme.title: The Hangover Part II

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon Taffer rescues a bar in Boca Raton, FL whose owner is failing to achieve the same success he found in the music industry as he is in the bar.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon Taffer heads to Port St. Lucie, FL to help two partners save their failing bar, regain their confidence, and learn how to properly run a business.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Bar expert Jon Taffer sets off to help Bill, the owner of The Chicken Bone, avoid financial ruin; Bill, a former customer who took over the Bone, learned the hard way that running a bar is much tougher than it looks.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon must fix a rat-infested bar owned by two fraternity brothers in Fells Point, Md., that is about to collapse.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: A bar with a golf theme needs major help to fix its horrendous sanitary conditions.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Taffer tries to save a marriage and a bar by splitting one bar into two.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: A Portland bar with a stubborn chef and an owner ready to sever ties with his over-bearing step-daughter and business partner who berates her staff.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon Taffer attempts to rescue a bar in Kingwood, Texas, whose owners have neglected both the business and the staff over the last several years.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: When college senior Anastasia Steele (Dakota Johnson) steps in for her sick roommate to interview prominent businessman Christian Grey (Jamie Dornan) for their campus paper, little does she realize the path her life will take. Christian, as enigmatic as he is rich and powerful, finds himself strangely drawn to Ana, and she to him. Though sexually inexperienced, Ana plunges headlong into an affair -- and learns that Christian's true sexual proclivities push the boundaries of pain and pleasure.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: When a wounded Christian Grey tries to entice a cautious Anastasia Steele back into his life, she demands a new arrangement before she will give him another chance. As the two begin to build trust and find stability, shadowy figures from Christian's past start to circle them, determined to destroy their hopes for a future together.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Believing they've left behind the shadowy figures from the past, billionaire Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia, fully embrace their inextricable connection and shared life of luxury. Just as the Greys begin to step into their new roles, sinister events come to light and jeopardize their happy ending before it even begins.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When a man (Christopher Lloyd) claiming to be Fester, the missing brother of Gomez Addams (Raul Julia), arrives at the Addams' home, the family is thrilled. However, Morticia (Anjelica Huston) begins to suspect the man is a fraud, since he cannot recall details of Fester's life. With the help of lawyer Tully Alford (Dan Hedaya), Fester manages to get the Addams clan evicted from their home. Gomez realizes the two men are conspiring to swindle the Addams fortune and that he must challenge Fester.

programme.title: Addams Family Values
programme.desc: The members of the odd Addams Family are up to more macabre antics in this sequel. This time around, Gomez Addams (Raul Julia) and his wife, Morticia (Anjelica Huston), are celebrating the arrival of a baby boy. But siblings Wednesday (Christina Ricci) and Pugsley (Jimmy Workman) are none too happy about the new addition, and try their best to eliminate the infant. When nanny Debbie Jelinsky (Joan Cusack) appears to keep the kids in line, her presence leads to an unexpected treacherous twist.

programme.desc: Flat from Wolverhampton with Paddock Shots and post-race interviews. Selected US racing also features.

programme.title: Stateside Live
programme.desc: Live US racing from Laurel Park, Gulfstream, Belmont at the Big A, Santa Anita, Keeneland, Mahoning Valley, Woodbine, Fairmount, Charles Town and Remington Park.

programme.title: Racing To Win
programme.desc: The latest in the series, a comprehensive preview show for Hong Kong racing. With form analysis, trackwork highlights and interviews, an expert team of presenters will also provide their selections.

programme.title: The Callans: Like Father Like Son
programme.desc: Father and son Neil and Jack Callan discuss life on the track as rivals, their relationship as a family, and the dedication required to make it as a jockey.

programme.title: Australian Racing Live
programme.desc: Live Australian racing from Lismore, Nowra and Sunshine Coast.

programme.title: Hong Kong Live
programme.desc: Racing from Sha Tin.

programme.title: Hong Kong Live
programme.desc: Racing from Sha Tin.

programme.title: International Raceday Live
programme.desc: Live international racing from Sha Tin and Parislongchamp as well as greyhound racing. A look ahead to this afternoon's UK racing.

programme.title: Raceday Live
programme.desc: Live Racing: ParisLongchamp stages the G2 Prix du Conseil de Paris plus two Listed races alongside domestic Jumps from Sedgefield.

programme.title: Stateside Live
programme.desc: Live US racing from Laurel Park, Gulfstream, Belmont at the Big A, Santa Anita, Keeneland, Woodbine, Hawthorne and Mountaineer.

programme.title: Petits plats en équilibre
programme.desc: Tout au long de la semaine, Jean-Luc Reichmann, accueille des candidats qui tentent de récolter des fonds pour l'association ELA, qui lutte contre les leucodystrophies.

programme.title: Les douze coups de midi
programme.desc: Tout au long de la semaine, les candidats qui rivalisent pour devenir Maître de midi, permettent également à l'association ELA (Association Européenne contre les Leucodystrophies) de récolter 5000 € par bonne réponse. Le dimanche 19 octobre, Jean-Luc Reichmann remettra à la présidente de l'association, Crystelle Cottard, un chèque correspondant au montant total collecté.

programme.title: Les douze coups de midi
programme.desc: E54 Tout au long de la semaine, les candidats qui rivalisent pour devenir "Maître de midi", permettent également à l'association ELA (Association Européenne contre les Leucodystrophies) de récolter 5000 € par bonne réponse. Le dimanche 19 octobre, Jean-Luc Reichmann remettra à la présidente de l'association, Crystelle Cottard, un chèque correspondant au montant total collecté.

programme.title: Plus belle la vie, encore plus belle

programme.title: Une victoire pour Noël
programme.desc: Directeur du club des supporters du club de football américain de Kansas City, Derreck doit mener Alana et sa famille jusqu'à la victoire dans un concours du meilleur supporter. Nouvellement arrivé en ville, il n'est ni sociable, ni passionné par le football américain, et d'un naturel sceptique. Sa rencontre avec Alana va ouvrir son esprit..

programme.title: Une victoire pour Noël

programme.title: Un crush pour Noël
programme.desc: Liz et Naomi, la trentaine, vivent en Californie et sont amies depuis le lycée. Pour les fêtes de fin d'année, elles rentrent à Weston, la ville de leur enfance, où elle ne sont pas retournées depuis une dizaine d'années. Elles revoient leur bande d'anciens camarades de lycée, dont Chris..

programme.title: Grands reportages
programme.desc: Porte d'entrée sur le Nord de l'Europe, près de 36 millions de véhicules empruntent chaque année l'autoroute A1, surnommée l'Autoroute du Nord. Pendant plusieurs mois, une équipe a suivi celles et ceux qui, dans l'ombre, se relaient nuit et jour pour assurer l'accueil et garantir la sécurité de ces voyageurs en transit.

programme.title: Reportages découverte
programme.desc: Commerçants ambulants, vendeurs à domicile ou guides touristiques : gros plan sur des femmes et des hommes qui empruntent chaque jour le tentaculaire réseau routier français pour leur travail car ils ont exercent un métier en itinérance. Ils avalent des kilomètres et parcourent la campagne, la montagne, les villages et les villes moyennes où les transports en commun ne sont pas toujours bien développés.

programme.title: Les Docs du week-end

programme.title: Star Academy, retour au château
programme.desc: Nikos Aliagas, en direct du plateau, débriefe les prestations des académiciens avec le corps professoral. Karima Charni est quant à elle en duplex aux côtés des élèves dans le bus qui les conduit au château de Dammarie-les-Lys pour recueillir leurs réactions à chaud. Le moment de découvrir également la première soirée des élèves avec leur arrivée et leur découverte du château de la Star Academy.

programme.title: Star Academy
programme.desc: Les nouveaux pensionnaires du château de Dammarie-les-Lys font leurs premiers pas dans leur nouveau domicile. Durant les prochaines semaines, c'est ici qu'ils vont passer leurs journées, entre cours et détente. C'est le moment pour eux de découvrir l'établissement, de passer en revue les chambres et les lieux de vie.

programme.desc: Dans le petit monde de Genoa City, les rivalités entre familles influentes vont bon train et se transmettent de génération en génération. Alliances et trahisons, amour et haine, argent et pouvoir, les enjeux sont de taille et les clans Newman, Abbott, Foster et Chancellor n'en finissent plus de se déchirer, parfois au péril de certaines vies.

programme.title: Plus belle la vie, encore plus belle
programme.desc: Après l'agression d'une habitante du quartier, Morgane mène l'enquête avec détermination. Ariane soupçonne Eric de dissimuler des informations. Pendant ce temps, à la colocation, une leçon imprévue risque de créer des tensions entre les colocataires..

programme.title: L'école des pères Noël
programme.desc: Kate est à la tête d'une école qui forme des pères Noël. Dan, quant à lui, est formateur dans l'école concurrente, celle des saint Nicolas. Lorsqu'il se retrouve licencié, il parvient à convaincre Kate de l'engager. Un matin, alors qu'ils se rendent au travail, ils manquent de renverser un homme sur la route : le véritable père Noël, qui a perdu la mémoire et ne sait plus qui il est..

programme.title: A la recherche de mon ange gardien
programme.desc: Photographe, Cécilia vit à Harmony Bay. Elle vient de perdre son père à l'approche des fêtes de Noël. Ces festivités sont un grand moment dans cette petite ville où tout le monde se réunit à cette occasion pour décorer les arbres de la forêt de Willow Glen. N'ayant pas le coeur à cela, Cécilia a décidé de ne pas organiser de fête cette année..

programme.title: Star Academy, la quotidienne
programme.desc: Cette quotidienne propose de revenir sur les moments forts de la journée des académiciens avec un débrief des prestations en direct, des cours et des moments de vie, sans oublier les évaluations tant redoutées du mardi. Trois académiciens seront nommés et devront défendre leur place au sein de la Star Academy lors du prime du samedi soir. L'un d'eux quittera l'aventure.

programme.title: Ici tout commence
programme.desc: Irritable, Carla monte sur ses grands chevaux. Face à Maya, Léonard ne tient pas sa langue. A L'atelier, Julia détourne l'attention de Jasmine.

programme.title: Demain nous appartient
programme.desc: Au boot camp, la compétition est lancée entre les élèves. William passe pour un dragueur un peu trop lourd. Le cadeau d'Erica à Sara et Roxane ne fait pas l'unanimité.

programme.title: Montmartre
programme.desc: Alors qu'elle découvre des incohérences sur la mort de son père, Céleste est convaincue qu'il s'agit d'un meurtre et non d'un suicide. Rose, rattrapée par son passé, est démasquée par la mère de Charles. Arsène, aidé d'Octave, tente de battre un record de vitesse pour sauver son projet et trouver des investisseurs..

programme.title: Montmartre
programme.desc: Alors qu'elle interroge une ancienne institutrice de Saint Loup, Céleste découvre un nouveau suspect qui pourrait être lié au meurtre de son père. Victime de préjugés, Arsène est sur le point de perdre un contrat majeur. Rose apprend une très bonne nouvelle et se hâte d'écrire à Charles pour lui annoncer..

programme.title: Eurodreams
programme.desc: Tous les lundis et jeudis après le prime-time, découvrez les six numéros gagnants et le N Dream et tentez de gagner jusqu'à 20 000 euros par mois pendant trente ans.

programme.title: New York Unité Spéciale
programme.desc: Dans le cadre d'une nouvelle affaire, Rollins est contraint de travailler sous couverture. Le but de cette mission est de trouver un homme qui est soupçonné de droguer et agresser des touristes. Benson vient en aide aux victimes. Elle essaie de trier avec elles les souvenirs de leurs hallucinations..

programme.title: New York Unité Spéciale
programme.desc: Un petit garçon est retrouvé seul à Central Park. Les recherches pour retrouver ses parents mènent les enquêteurs à un attentat terroriste de grande ampleur. La mère du petit garçon et son compagnon tuent plusieurs personnes dans le parc avant d'être interceptés par le forces de l'ordre..

programme.title: New York Unité Spéciale
programme.desc: Après seize ans passés en prison pour viol, Sean Roberts est acquitté grâce à une analyse ADN. Mais le lendemain de cet acquittement, Fin est appelé sur une scène de crime : la fille de la femme qui avait accusé Sean seize ans auparavant a été violée et brûlée chez sa mère. Celle-ci livre un témoignage édifiant : elle a entendu Sean en bas de chez elle, en train de discuter avec sa fille..

programme.title: New York Unité Spéciale
programme.desc: Après un rendez-vous avec un certain Tyler, dont elle a fait connaissance sur un site de rencontre, Kelsey Sommers, journaliste sur une chaîne locale à New York, reçoit des photos intimes auxquelles elle répond par des clichés d'elle-même. Mais elle déchante aussitôt : Tyler la menace d'envoyer ces photos à tous ses contacts si elle ne lui verse pas 50 000 dollars..

programme.title: Les Feux de l'amour
programme.desc: La famille Abbott, installée à Genoa City, dans le Wisconsin, possède une immense fortune et une gigantesque entreprise. Les luttes de pouvoir, trahisons au sein même du clan sont monnaie courante. Leur ennemi de toujours, l'industriel Victor Newman, ne fait rien pour leur faciliter la tâche, bien au contraire. D'alliances en ruptures, les illusions de chacun se heurtent à l'hostilité, à la jalousie et à la haine des autres. Entre amour et pouvoir, le choix est souvent celui de la puissance. Un Soap Opera mondialement célèbre, produit et diffusé depuis plus de quarante ans aux Etats-Unis ! A ce jour, une trentaine de pays différents diffusent le feuilleton chaque jour, et c'est en France que le feuilleton réalise ses meilleures audiences, juste derrière les Etats-Unis La famille Abbott, installée à Genoa City, dans le Wisconsin, possède une immense fortune et une gigantesque entreprise. programme.title: Plus belle la vie, encore plus belle
programme.desc: Le coupable de la tentative de meurtre révèle ses motivations. Barbara invite Luna, Blanche et Jennifer à une virée au restaurant. A la résidence, Nisma prend une décision qu'elle partage avec Apolline. Thomas croit que Riva a replongé, mais Léa lui fait une révélation surprenante. Patrick a toujours du mal à trouver sa place et Mirta et Yolande organisent une formation premiers secours. Plusieurs acteurs de "Plus belle la vie" reprennent leur personnage dans cette suite qui se place dans la continuité directe de la première série Une découverte macabre à la résidence suscite des hypothèses et réveille des superstitions. Pendant ce temps, Apolline cherche à clarifier la situation avec la famille Kepler. Au Mistral, Djawad prend l'initiative d'organiser une fête d'Halloween, ajoutant une touche festive à l'atmosphère tendue.. Marion Lallier - Réalisateur Nicolas Viegeolat - Réalisateur Olivier Chapelle - Réalisateur Lionel Smila - Réalisateur Pascal Heylbroeck - Réalisateur Claire de la

programme.title: Notre miracle de Noël
programme.desc: Charlotte, Bénédict et Henry s'apprêtent à fêter Nöel dans le manoir de leur grand-mère récemment décédée. Ils veulent lui rendre hommage mais aussi mettre à profit ce moment pour décider de l'avenir de l'entreprise familiale. De vieilles rancoeurs et de tendres sentiments ne vont pas tarder à resurgir. Une mystérieuse jeune femme, spécialiste en successions, débarque et souffle un vent de folie sur la famille.. programme.title: Le manège magique de Noël
programme.desc: A la tête d'un atelier de restauration de carrousels, qu'il partage avec sa fille Lila, Thomas voit un client pour le moins spécial se présenter dans sa boutique. En effet, c'est le prince du royaume d'Ancadia en personne qui vient requérir leur aide pour tenter de remettre en état le carrousel familial traditionnellement utilisé pour le défilé des fêtes de Noël. Alors que la grande date approche à grands pas, Lila décide de se consacrer à plein temps dans la restauration du manège. Pour atteindre l'objectif, elle doit travailler main dans la main avec le séduisant prince, visiblement pas insensible au charme de la jeune femme.. programme.title: Star Academy, la quotidienne
programme.desc: Cette quotidienne revient sur les moments forts de la journée des académiciens avec un débrief des prestations, des cours, des moments de vie, sans oublier les évaluations Cette quotidienne revient sur les moments forts de la journée des académiciens avec un débrief des prestations, des cours, des moments de vie, sans oublier les évaluations.

programme.title: Ici tout commence
programme.desc: Dans le contexte du concours d'entrée à l'Institut Auguste Armand, le retour de Louis, qui s'allie à Teyssier pour faire tomber un candidat qu'il juge arrogant, est insolite. Anouk est sacrée meilleure cheffe du monde. Ses méthodes ont bousculé l'Institut et ont créé des tensions, notamment avec Teyssier et Clotilde, qui préfèrent des approches plus traditionnelles. Fleur Pessin, Anouk Revero, César Verneuil et Bianca Roma sont les nouveaux personnages qui font leurs débuts au casting de cette sixième saison A L'institut, Carla n'hésite pas à fendre l'armure. Avec Maya, Gaspard se fait prendre à son propre piège. programme.title: Demain nous appartient
programme.desc: Un violent séisme frappe la ville de Sète. Les secours sont mobilisés pour faire face à cette situation d'urgence. Tandis que l'hôpital déclenche le Plan Blanc, les écoles sont évacuées. Dans le chaos qui s'ensuit, les personnalités des uns et des autres s'expriment de manière exacerbée. Une saison 9 marquée notamment par le départ de Romane Parc dans le rôle de Lilou Clavel et Patrick Seminor dans celui de Joël Tundis Une bagarre éclate entre Bastien et Marceau. Alex a un nouveau projet pour Judith. programme.title: Petits plats en équilibre
programme.desc: Laurent Mariotte donne toutes les astuces pour préparer de bons petits plats, comme un vrai chef, avec des ingrédients frais et de saison Laurent Mariotte donne toutes les astuces pour préparer de bons petits plats, comme un vrai chef, avec des ingrédients frais et de saison.

programme.title: Harry Potter à l'école des sorciers
programme.desc: Harry Potter est un orphelin élevé par son oncle Vernon et sa tante Pétunia. Alors qu'il n'était qu'un tout jeune enfant, ces deux odieux personnages lui ont raconté que ses parents avaient trouvé la mort dans un accident de voiture. Le jour de ses 11 ans, Harry reçoit la visite d'un homme gigantesque dénommé Rubeus Hagrid, qui prétend que Harry est le fils de deux puissants sorciers et qu'il possède des pouvoirs extraordinaires. Trop content d'avoir trouvé ce sauveur providentiel lui offrant l'occasion de sortir des griffes de ses détestables tuteurs, Harry Potter accepte avec joie de suivre le mystérieux personnage pour se rendre à Poudlard, la célèbre école de sorcellerie.. programme.title: La Brea
programme.desc: Après avoir plongé dans les secrets du monde primitif, les Harris se lancent dans une véritable course contre la montre pour retrouver Eve. Les enjeux sont plus élevés que jamais. Alors qu'ils affrontent les créatures préhistoriques les plus dangereuses, ils tentent de se réunir et de retrouver le monde qu'ils ont connu. Des effets spéciaux spectaculaires au service d'un scénario soigné, qui ménage quelques coups de théâtre efficaces Après la destruction de la clairière lors d'une attaque de dinosaures, les survivants doivent trouver un nouveau lieu où s'installer. Gavin découvre un indice sur l'endroit où Eve a été emmenée, mais ses recherches ont des conséquences tragiques... programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: As Death Eaters wreak havoc in both Muggle and Wizard worlds, Hogwarts is no longer a safe haven for students. Though Harry suspects there are new dangers lurking within the castle walls, Dumbledore is more intent than ever on preparing the young wizard for the final battle with Voldemort. Teenage hormones run rampant through Hogwarts, presenting a different sort of danger. Love may be in the air, but tragedy looms and Hogwarts may never be the same again.

programme.title: 10 Things You Don't Know
programme.desc: Surprising things about Reese Witherspoon, from all the secrets behind "Legally Blonde" to what really happened on the set of "Friends.".

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
programme.desc: Adaptation of the first of J.K. Rowling's popular children's novels about Harry Potter, a boy who learns on his eleventh birthday that he is the orphaned son of two powerful wizards and possesses unique magical powers of his own. He is summoned from his life as an unwanted child to become a student at Hogwarts, an English boarding school for wizards. There, he meets several friends who become his closest allies and help him discover the truth about his parents' mysterious deaths.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The follow-up to "Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone" finds young wizard Harry Potterand his friends, Ron and Hermione, facing new challenges during their second year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry as they try to discover a dark force that is terrorizing the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry Potter's (Daniel Radcliffe) third year at Hogwarts starts off badly when he learns deranged killer Sirius Black (Gary Oldman) has escaped from Azkaban prison and is bent on murdering the teenage wizard. While Hermione's (Emma Watson) cat torments Ron's (Rupert Grint) sickly rat, causing a rift among the trio, a swarm of nasty Dementors is sent to protect the school from Black. A mysterious new teacher helps Harry learn to defend himself, but what is his secret tie to Sirius Black?

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: During Harry's fourth year at Hogwarts a competition will be held between three schools of wizardry, and contestants will be magically chosen for the very dangerous event.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Now in his fifth year at Hogwarts, Harry learns that many in the wizarding community do not know the truth of his encounter with Lord Voldemort. Cornelius Fudge, minister of Magic, appoints his toady, Dolores Umbridge, as Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher, for he fears that professor Dumbledore will take his job. But her teaching is deficient and her methods, cruel, so Harry prepares a group of students to defend the school against a rising tide of evil.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: As Death Eaters wreak havoc in both Muggle and Wizard worlds, Hogwarts is no longer a safe haven for students. Though Harry suspects there are new dangers lurking within the castle walls, Dumbledore is more intent than ever on preparing the young wizard for the final battle with Voldemort. Teenage hormones run rampant through Hogwarts, presenting a different sort of danger. Love may be in the air, but tragedy looms and Hogwarts may never be the same again.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Without the guidance and protection of their professors, Harry (Daniel Radcliffe), Ron (Rupert Grint) and Hermione (Emma Watson) begin a mission to destroy the Horcruxes, the sources of Voldemort's immortality. Though they must rely on one another more than ever, dark forces threaten to tear them apart. Voldemort's Death Eaters have seized control of the Ministry of Magic and Hogwarts, and they are searching for Harry -- even as he and his friends prepare for the ultimate showdown.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: A clash between good and evil awaits as young Harry, Ron and Hermione prepare for a final battle against Lord Voldemort. Harry has grown into a steely lad on a mission to rid the world of evil. The friends must search for the Horcruxes that keep the dastardly wizard immortal. Harry and Voldemort meet at Hogwarts Castle for a showdown where the forces of darkness may finally meet their match.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Without the guidance and protection of their professors, Harry (Daniel Radcliffe), Ron (Rupert Grint) and Hermione (Emma Watson) begin a mission to destroy the Horcruxes, the sources of Voldemort's immortality. Though they must rely on one another more than ever, dark forces threaten to tear them apart. Voldemort's Death Eaters have seized control of the Ministry of Magic and Hogwarts, and they are searching for Harry -- even as he and his friends prepare for the ultimate showdown.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: A clash between good and evil awaits as young Harry, Ron and Hermione prepare for a final battle against Lord Voldemort. Harry has grown into a steely lad on a mission to rid the world of evil. The friends must search for the Horcruxes that keep the dastardly wizard immortal. Harry and Voldemort meet at Hogwarts Castle for a showdown where the forces of darkness may finally meet their match.

programme.title: Ambulance
programme.desc: Needing money to cover his wife's medical bills, a decorated veteran teams up with his adoptive brother to steal $32 million from a Los Angeles bank. However, when their getaway goes spectacularly wrong, the desperate thieves hijack an ambulance that's carrying a severely wounded cop and an EMT worker. Caught in a high-speed chase, the two siblings must figure out a way to outrun the law while keeping their hostages alive.

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: After the members of a team of scientists (Harold Ramis, Dan Aykroyd, Bill Murray) lose their cushy positions at a university in New York City, they decide to become "ghostbusters" to wage a high-tech battle with the supernatural for money. They stumble upon a gateway to another dimension, a doorway that will release evil upon the city. The Ghostbusters must now save New York from complete destruction.

programme.title: Ghostbusters II
programme.desc: After saving New York City from a ghost attack, the Ghostbusters -- a team of spirit exterminators -- is disbanded for demolishing parts of the city during the battle. But when Ghostbuster Peter Venkman (Bill Murray) learns that spirits have taken an interest in his son, the men launch a rogue ghost-chasing mission. The quest quickly goes awry, landing them in court. But when the ghosts turn on the judge, he issues an order allowing the Ghostbusters to get back to work.

programme.title: Cocaine Bear
programme.desc: An oddball group of cops, criminals, tourists and teens converges in a Georgia forest after a 500-pound black bear ingests a large amount of cocaine and goes on a drug-fueled rampage.

programme.title: Firestarter
programme.desc: A couple desperately try to hide their daughter, Charlie, from a shadowy federal agency that wants to harness her unprecedented gift for turning fire into a weapon of mass destruction. Her father taught her how to defuse her power, but as Charlie turns 11, the fire becomes harder and harder to control. When a mysterious operative finally finds the family, he tries to seize Charlie once and for all -- but she has other plans.

programme.title: Belfast
programme.desc: A 9-year-old boy experiences love, laughter and loss as he comes of age amid the music and social tumult of the late 1960s.

programme.title: Overserved With Lisa Vanderpump
programme.desc: Lisa transforms her olive grove for a trip to Greece, complete with a 10-dish feast and an Olympic game; fearless guests Steve-O and Margaret Cho serve up unexpected moments, like highly inappropriate temporary tattoos.

programme.title: Hollywood Medium With Tyler Henry
programme.desc: Tyler gives detailed messages to Ross Mathews from his late father; Jodie Sweetin gets validation from her departed grandmother; Margret Cho gets an unexpected visit from beyond by a comedy legend; Jillian Rose Reed is left speechless.

programme.title: Hollywood Medium With Tyler Henry
programme.desc: Tyler makes a tearful connection for Amber Rose and her mother; Heather and Terry Dubrow receive a message from a rock star brother who died of a drug overdose; Tyler helps bring closure to Cheryl Burke.

programme.title: Hollywood Medium With Tyler Henry
programme.desc: A murdered child reaches out via Tyler to reconnect with Tracey Gold; Tyler makes a connection to lost loved ones with WWE Diva Natalya Neidhart; Michael Sam gets insight from Tyler; Christopher Knight has an emotionally charged awakening.

programme.title: Hollywood Medium With Tyler Henry
programme.desc: Tyler gives a life-changing message to Joey, Matthew and Andrew Lawrence from their departed grandmother; Tyler is star struck as he channels a friend whose tragic death still haunts Candis Cayne; Tyler connects with Loni Love's deceased loved ones.

programme.title: Hollywood Medium With Tyler Henry
programme.desc: Tyler sees a mysterious woman in Terrell Owens's love life; Fairuza Balk has a shocking connection to her recently departed brother; Olivia Culpo is awe struck by her first psychic reading; a warning and message of hope for Carnie Wilson.

Caught in a high-speed chase, the two siblings must figure out a way to outrun the law while keeping their hostages alive.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Boo 2! A Madea Halloween
programme.desc: Tiffany travels to Derrick Lake to celebrate her 18th birthday at a Halloween frat party in the middle of the woods. Frantic and worried, Madea, Aunt Bam and Hattie hop in the car to save her from the same terrible fate that befell a group of teens there years earlier. Chaos soon strikes when the would-be heroes find themselves fighting for their lives against an array of spooky monsters, goblins and boogeymen.

programme.title: Key Largo
programme.desc: This classic film noir by John Huston stars Humphrey Bogart as World War II vet Frank McCloud. Visiting Key Largo to pay his respects to the family of his late war buddy, McCloud attempts to comfort his comrade's widow, Nora (Lauren Bacall), and father, James Temple (Lionel Barrymore), who operate a hotel. But McCloud realizes that mobsters, led by the infamous Johnny Rocco (Edward G. Robinson), are staying in the hotel. When the criminals take over the establishment, conflict is inevitable.

programme.title: The Outlaw Josey Wales
programme.desc: Josey Wales (Clint Eastwood) watches helplessly as his wife and child are murdered, by Union men led by Capt. Terrill (Bill McKinney). Seeking revenge, Wales joins the Confederate Army. He refuses to surrender when the war ends, but his fellow soldiers go to hand over their weapons -- and are massacred by Terrill. Wales guns down some of Terrill's men and flees to Texas, where he tries to make a new life for himself, but the bounty on his head endangers him and his new surrogate family.

programme.title: Woman of the Year
programme.desc: Tess Harding (Katharine Hepburn) is a progressively-minded political journalist. Sam Craig (Spencer Tracy) is a sports writer with very traditional values. The only thing the two have in common is that they both work for the same New York City newspaper. Despite an initial and mutual dislike, the two eventually fall in love and get married. When Tess wins the Woman of the Year award, traditional gender roles become flipped and their relationship suffers as a result.

programme.title: Rio Bravo
programme.desc: When gunslinger Joe Burdette (Claude Akins) kills a man in a saloon, Sheriff John T. Chance (John Wayne) arrests him with the aid of the town drunk, Dude (Dean Martin). Before long, Burdette's brother, Nathan (John Russell), comes around, indicating that he's prepared to bust his brother out of jail if necessary. Chance decides to make a stand until reinforcements arrive, enlisting Dude, an old cripple named Stumpy (Walter Brennan) and baby-faced cowboy Colorado Ryan (Ricky Nelson) to help.

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: In 1939, newly created British intelligence agency MI6 recruits Cambridge mathematics alumnus Alan Turing (Benedict Cumberbatch) to crack Nazi codes, including Enigma -- which cryptanalysts had thought unbreakable. Turing's team, including Joan Clarke (Keira Knightley), analyze Enigma messages while he builds a machine to decipher them. Turing and team finally succeed and become heroes, but in 1952, the quiet genius encounters disgrace when authorities reveal he is gay and send him to prison.

programme.title: King Solomon's Mines
programme.desc: A rescue party sets out to find an explorer who has disappeared on an African treasure hunt. The search leads the party across the continent and through the terrors of jungle, swamp and desert. Their ultimate destination is the fabled lost mine of Solomon, a source of unimaginable wealth and deadly danger. From H. Rider Haggard's novel.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unraveling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks. The investigation puts him on the trail of an illegal arms dealer and his hit lady.

programme.title: In a Relationship
programme.desc: During a summer in Los Angeles, long-term couple Owen and Hallie may be breaking up. And just as their relationship reaches a turning point, Matt and Willa embark on a romance of their own.

programme.desc: Matías Franco is a lobbyist, manager of interests who works for individuals, companies and corporations. He is dedicated to pressuring his contacts in power to do business with his clients.

programme.title: Gone With the Wind: Restored Version
programme.desc: Presented as originally released in 1939. Includes themes and character depictions which may be offensive and problematic to contemporary audiences. Epic Civil War drama focuses on the life of petulant Southern belle Scarlett O'Hara. Starting with her idyllic life on a sprawling plantation, the film traces her survival through the tragic history of the South during the Civil War and Reconstruction, and her tangled love affairs with Ashley Wilkes and Rhett Butler.

programme.title: Sweet Bird of Youth
programme.desc: After unsuccessfully trying his luck in Hollywood, charming gigolo Chance Wayne (Paul Newman) wanders back to his hometown, accompanied by Alexandra Del Lago (Geraldine Page), a movie star on the wane. Chance quickly falls back into his old rut -- he's still smitten with his former sweetheart, Heavenly Finley (Shirley Knight), but her thuggish brother (Rip Torn) and her crooked politician father (Ed Begley) both hate him. When Alexandra leaves town, Chance is left with little more than trouble.

programme.title: Hollywood One on One
programme.desc: Hollywood celebrities give insight into their personal and professional lives, and open up about upcoming projects.

programme.title: Raintree County
programme.desc: When Southern belle Susanna Drake (Elizabeth Taylor) visits Indiana, she falls for John Wickliff Shawnessy (Montgomery Clift), an abolitionist with strong ideals. However, John falters while he lets Drake tempt him away from his true love, Nell Gaither (Eva Marie Saint). After Drake deceives John into marriage, the two move to her New Orleans household, where he discovers that mental illness runs in her family. When the Civil War begins, John uses it to escape from the unhappy marriage.

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: A vengeful crime boss forms an unlikely partnership with a detective, to catch the elusive serial killer who attacked him.

programme.title: The Naked Spur
programme.desc: Howard Kemp (James Stewart) has been tracking killer Ben Vandergroat (Robert Ryan) for a long time. In the Colorado Rockies, he teams up with prospector Jesse Tate (Millard Mitchell) and former Union soldier Roy Anderson (Ralph Meeker). Thinking Kemp is a sheriff, they agree to help for a small fee. When they catch Vandergroat, he tells them Kemp is pursuing a $5,000 bounty. After demanding equal shares, the uneasy alliance heads for Kansas as Vandergroat tries to turn them against each other.

programme.title: The Brink
programme.desc: A reckless police inspector is on a mission to crack down on a criminal's gold smuggling scheme.

programme.title: The Spy Gone North
programme.desc: A South Korean army major poses as a businessman to infiltrate a North Korean nuclear facility in 1993.

programme.title: The Fastest Gun Alive
programme.desc: Former gunslinger George Temple (Glenn Ford) wants to keep his gun-fighting days a secret as he builds a new life. It seems whenever Temple's prowess with a gun is discovered, he and his wife, Dora (Jeanne Crain), have to skip town before someone challenges him to a duel. After eventually settling in a small town as a quiet shopkeeper, a drunken Temple makes the mistake of showing off his skills. When the criminal Vinnie Harold (Broderick Crawford) catches wind of it, a showdown is imminent.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: After his childhood buddy is murdered while visiting Detroit, rebellious cop Axel Foley (Eddie Murphy) follows the leads to Beverly Hills, Calif., under the auspices of a vacation. He checks in with old friend Jenny Summers (Lisa Eilbacher) and starts to believe her boss, art dealer Victor Maitland (Steven Berkoff), might somehow be involved in the murder. However, Lt. Bogomil (Ronny Cox) of the Beverly Hills Police Department does not trust Foley, and hinders his search for evidence.

programme.title: Human Capital
programme.desc: The lives of two families collide when their children begin a relationship and it leads to a tragic accident.

programme.title: Coin Locker Girl
programme.desc: Abandoned as a baby in a subway locker, Il-Young becomes an enforcer for a woman known as Mother. While on another assignment, Il-Young meets Suk-hyun, the son of a debtor, and develops unfamiliar feelings toward the world outside China Town.

programme.title: Love Me or Leave Me

Under Martin's management, Ruth works her way to the top of the entertainment industry, eventually becoming a famous jazz singer and Broadway actress. But as Ruth's popularity grows, Martin's obsessive and controlling behavior begins to threaten her success and happiness.

programme.title: They Died With Their Boots On
programme.desc: George Armstrong Custer (Errol Flynn) is a rebellious but ambitious soldier, eager to join the Civil War. During the war, Custer has numerous successes to his credit, even though he disobeys orders. After the war concludes, he marries Libby Bacon (Olivia de Havilland) and is assigned to the Dakota Territory. Custer negotiates honestly with the Sioux on land, but due to corruption from others, a battle with Sitting Bull's forces occurs at Little Big Horn.

programme.desc: As the owners of Karras Games gather for a murder mystery weekend, the immersive experience takes a puzzling twist when a killer strikes for real. The police's detective skills are put to the test as they are forced to solve this case on their own.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The annual Midsomer Scarecrow Festival takes a grisly turn as bodies begin appearing on poles displayed alongside their straw creations the investigation reveals rivalries that run deep and shows people will do just about anything to win.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The Midsomer Mummers, an amateur operatic society, rehearses for its charity concert when the body of an unknown man is found in the theatre the investigation quickly becomes a race to discover who is desperate to take centre stage.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Each year, the village of Angel's Rise hosts the Psychic Fayre. Founded by the Saint-Stephens family in memory of their late daughter, the event attracts mediums, psychics and followers of the occult. When a body is found surrounded by ritual symbols on the eve of the festival, Barnaby must step into the spiritual world to find the killer.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The crime drama returns for a new series. The unveiling of a newly-discovered novel by deceased Midsomer crime-writer George Summersbee at the Luxton Deeping Crime Festival is jeopardised when the manuscript is stolen and a woman is fatally electrocuted by a booby-trapped roulette wheel. Can new dad Barnaby untangle a web of jealousy and obsession to find the killer?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a pub landlady is crushed to death during a magic show in Midsomer Oaks, Barnaby and Nelson uncover conflict between the village church and ancient pagan traditions. Is famous magician Gideon Latimer to blame or is he the target?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby investigates whether a ballad made famous by a late, lamented folk singer could have been the inspiration for a murder. Did someone want to kill Toby Winning for threatening to take the Little Crosby Folk Festival away from Midsomer - or is the true motive something hidden for 20 years?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby tries to find out just who is targeting the Midsomer Vinae Winery - what does the attack have to do with the death of a child in a hit-and-run accident?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a survivalist is found murdered in his bombproof shelter, Barnaby unravels a dark conspiracy to reveal how far people will go to escape the end of the world.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Gated estate Challis Court is a tight-knit community for retired police officers, but when a new arrival is found dead, the other residents regard the murder as an affront. Barnaby realizes that the killer is likely an ex-police officer.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Pastry chef Chrissie Larkton's mill has been in her family for centuries. She restored it and turned it into a thriving online business, but the popularity has overshadowed Lower Blissingham, and many of the villagers are not happy about it.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The residents of Elverton-Cum-Latterly battle in the Dominoes Competition that dates back decades, but when the event occurs the same night as a drag queen fundraiser for a terminally ill teenager, it results in a deadly clash of cultures.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team visit the poignant Thiepval Memorial to the Missing of the Somme to hear family stories and examine objects linked to the conflict, including bronze sculptures of troops modeled from trench-clay and paintings of war horses.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A painting by an important Welsh artist therapeutic collection of Poole Pottery a kimono given as a gift for outstanding work 100 years ago in Japan.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Remnants of German parachute silk used in World War II rare piece of early English glass.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team visit the Royal Ballet School at Richmond Park in London objects brought to camera include exquisitely modeled porcelain figures made by ballerina Anna Pavlova and a long bow reputed to have been used in World War II.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Featuring a 16th-century print, and evidence of one of the earliest Beatles concerts.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies play a slide game before watching Becky and Jed look for eggs on their farm. Then their mum cooks them for their tea. In Teletubbyland, the Lion and Bear play their hide and seek game.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Alex Pascall and some children sing to their dolls to rock them to sleep. Laa-Laa wants to sing a lovely song, but Tinky Winky is crunching his Tubby Toast too loudly!

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Laa-Laa dances with her ball. A little boy tells us why he likes to live in his block of flats. A balloon appears in Teletubbyland. The Teletubbies follow a balloon.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies giggle as they play their 'Through the Arch' game. The windmill stops them to watch a little girl and her dad go for a walk in the town.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies line up to say 'Eh-oh' and then watch Matthew and Mark feed a baby calf. The Teletubbies play a game to see who can eat their Tubby Custard the slowest, but Po can't wait and eats her Tubby Custard very fast.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies and some children watch Tamzin Griffin pretend to be Funny Lady and tell the story of the Naughty Pig. Dipsy's hat keeps blowing away and he has to chase it all over Teletubbyland.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Tubbies crawl through the arch in Home Hill and watch Alex Pascall and some children sing 'Handy Hands'.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children play with balls of different shapes and sizes. In Teletubbyland, something happens to Dipsy's hat.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: It's time for the Teletubbies to do their exercises. A voice trumpet rises and the Teletubbies stretch up and down to it's instructions.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children learn about the number two. Dipsy and Laa-Laa are eating Tubby Toast. They play the game 'Two Little Teletubbies', but while they are playing the Noo-Noo tidies up their Tubby Toast.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies are eating Tubby Toast. They stop to watch Amy making pasta. A ball of string appears in Teletubbyland. Po knocks the string in to the air with her scooter and it makes a stringy mess all over Teletubbyland.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Tinky Winky calls the other Tubbies to come and watch Tamzin Griffin pretend to be Funny Lady and tell the story about the naughty sock. The Tubby Toast machine makes a tower of tubby toast.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children looking at penguins waddling and swimming. In Teletubbyland, the Tubbies play walk fast and slow, far and near and other different ways.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies play 'Boo', but stop to watch Ned help his dad plant and water some geraniums. In Teletubbyland, nine pretty flowers and a watering can appear.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Samira and her friends show the Teletubbies their gymnastic routines. The Teletubbies do their own gymnastics.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch Matthew and James help their uncle milk the cows. In Teletubbyland, the Tubby Custard machine isn't working, so they sing a special 'Tubby Custard' song. Then, the Tubby Custard machine works again.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: A voice trumpet appears and the Teletubbies dance, before watching two girls do some Flamenco dancing with their teacher. It's time for the Teletubbies to wash their feet. They love using their Tubby Sponges.

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.desc: The Teletubbies want to go to sleep, but Tinky Winky finds Po already asleep in his bed. So he goes to look for somewhere else to sleep.

programme.desc: The key hea"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"dlines from the day so far.

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: David Dickinson is in Wolverhampton with his dealers Karen Dalmeny, James Layte, Mark Stevens and Fay Rutter.

programme.title: Tenable
programme.desc: A team of five solicitors take on the Tenable Tower and attempt to answer a series of Top 10 list questions in the hope of winning £125,000. Warwick Davis hosts.

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as Darren from Cornwall, Jodie from Northampton, Safiyah from Twickenham, Paul from Liverpool pit their wits against one of the ruthless Chasers in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. They work as a team and play strategically to answer general knowledge questions against the clock and race down the game board to the exit without being caught.

programme.desc: A mysterious murder in an upscale community is solved by cell phone forensics.

programme.title: Forensic Files II
programme.desc: After the brutal slaying of a young couple on a road trip, the victims' families begin receiving disturbing letters.

programme.title: Forensic Files II
programme.desc: After a young mother is found brutally murdered in her home, investigators find startling clues on her cell phone that could lead to her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files II
programme.desc: An amazing new forensic tool turns a cold case around.

programme.title: Forensic Files II
programme.desc: A gruesome find in a small town church sends investigators searching for a killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files II
programme.desc: An insurance agent is shot execution style in his office, but the killer leaves no fingerprints, and there are no murder weapon found at the scene; then investigators discover a critical clue invisible to the naked eye that cracks the case.

programme.title: Forensic Files II
programme.desc: A healthy, young mother mysteriously dies after a minor traffic accident triggering an investigation.

programme.title: Forensic Files II
programme.desc: Investigators search for clues after a body is discovered in a watery grave.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Detectives search for the bombers of two churches in Illinois, hoping that the materials used in the remnants of the handmade bombs will offer the clues to catch the culprits.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: There was no apparent reason for the young, healthy college student to be dead; but when the medical examiner found the tiniest of clues during the autopsy, investigators were able to unravel the mystery of betrayal and revenge.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman is stabbed a hundred times and her body positioned in a suggestive manner. This could be a hate crime against women.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police are able to create a composite sketch of a man burnt beyond recognition. But tracking the killer is more challenging.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: By cutting a strand of a murdered man's hair into sections, forensics reveal a record of his last six months alive, and find he was frequently ingesting huge amounts of arsenic.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A bullet-riddled car, a missing driver, and no witnesses, an ambush or a random attack; the clue was something so tiny, it was measured in millionths of a meter.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Teenager is found half-naked with her throat slit; a single foreign hair found on her thumb may finger the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Two women who lived in the same apartment complex were brutally murdered; the similarities of the crime scenes led police to believe they were dealing with a serial killer who hated women, and they had to find him before he struck again.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Weeks after a student vanishes, the body of an unknown female is found in the ashes of a fire 700 miles away; an alert policeman realizes the crimes could be connected.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Investigators face a growing list of suspects after a beautiful flight attendant is brutally murdered in her own home.

programme.desc: The assistant manager of the restaurant had been stabbed to death; police knew why he'd been killed: $8,000 was missing from the safe. As to who was responsible, his family and friends couldn't even imagine who'd want to hurt him.

programme.desc: Police don't have a basis for comparison to match shoe impressions, blood drops and DNA evidence from a murder scene.

programme.desc: A masked gunman kills two members of a family and wounds two others after they interrupt his burglary at their upscale suburban home.

programme.title: Very Scary People
programme.desc: The summer of 1985 was one of the hottest Los Angeles had seen in a century. But terrified residents weren't sleeping with the windows open; a killer known as the "Night Stalker" was on the loose.

programme.title: Very Scary People
programme.desc: A tip from a teenage boy leads to the identity of the Night Stalker and twenty-four hours later a mob of angry citizens track him down and capture him.

programme.title: Very Scary People
programme.desc: Desperate for answers community members live in terror waiting for the man dubbed the Co-Ed Killer to strike again.

programme.title: Very Scary People
programme.desc: In April 1973, Edmund Kemper, 24, murders six coeds in and around the city of Santa Cruz, Calif., shaking the community to its core.

programme.title: Very Scary People
programme.desc: The story of the millionaire heir to a vast real estate fortune who has been linked to the deaths of his wife, his best friend, and his neighbor.

programme.title: Very Scary People
programme.desc: Six weeks after jumping bail in Galveston, Texas, Robert Durst is caught on a store security camera in Pennsylvania shoplifting a sandwich and is quickly sent back to Galveston to stand trial for the murder of his neighbor, Morris Black.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The brutal murder of a state park employee over $2,000 rattles her co-workers and tourists while leaving police to sift through hundreds of leads.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When evidence shows a woman's rape and murder, police must find the killer as well as the victim.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A week after a couple disappears from the beach, police get a mysterious lead from a robbery.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Fifteen years later, DNA technology leads to justice for a murdered woman and her savagely beaten 4-year-old daughter.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A quiet waitress who hasn't been to work in two days vanishes without a trace; police suspect a date gone wrong.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The search for a missing exotic dancer led police to an isolated 75-acre site where someone had been shot and cremated, thus destroying all evidence... almost; piece of a foot provided enough DNA for a genetic profile and positive ID.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After years of suffering domestic abuse, a young woman is found murdered in her bathtub; among numerous clues, a hamburger bun proves the most incriminating.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Evidence that includes threatening emails, a missing person and an abandoned truck lead police to a woman's suspected killer, but they don't have the victim's body.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman has an accidental fall down a flight of stairs and appears to have hit her head, but the lack of blood splatter and misplaced shoes lead police to believe the fall was staged.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A church member gets gunned down after leaving choir practice; although witnesses see little and not much evidence exists, investigators learn that she had been having affairs for years.

programme.desc: When a man perishes in a fire while working in his garage, his death is initially ruled an accident until a forensic odontologist changes the direction of the case.

Along the way, the family stops off at a sinister mansion that Jim has been asked to sell, only to discover it's haunted by Master Gracey (Nathaniel Parker) ; his stern butler, Ramsley (Terence Stamp) ; and two other servants who need some help breaking a curse.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: When monsters want to get away from it all, they go to Count Dracula's (Adam Sandler) Hotel Transylvania, a lavish resort where they can be themselves without humans around to bother them. On one special weekend, Dracula invites creatures like the Invisible Man, the Mummy and others to celebrate the 118th birthday of his daughter, Mavis (Selena Gomez). However, an unforeseen complication unfolds when an ordinary human unwittingly crashes the party and falls in love with Mavis.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Now that Dracula (Adam Sandler) has opened the Hotel Transylvania's doors to humans, things are changing for the better; however, Drac is secretly worried that his half-human grandson, Dennis, isn't showing his vampire side. So, while Mavis and Johnny are away, Drac enlists his friends to help him put the boy through a "monster-in-training" boot camp. But things really get batty when Drac's cantankerous, old-school dad (Mel Brooks) pays an unexpected visit.

programme.title: Goosebumps 2: Haunted Halloween
programme.desc: While collecting junk one day, best friends Sonny and Sam meet Slappy, a mischievous talking dummy from an unpublished "Goosebumps" book by R.L. Stine. Hoping to start his own family, Slappy kidnaps Sonny's mother and brings all of his ghoulish friends back to life -- just in time for Halloween. As the sleepy town becomes overrun with monsters, witches and other mysterious creatures, Sonny joins forces with his sister, Sam and a friendly neighbor to save mom and foil Slappy's wicked plan.

programme.title: Cruella

She soon meets a pair of thieves who appreciate her appetite for mischief, and together they build a life for themselves on the streets of London. Now, with the help of a magical cat, the kids must steal the witches' book of spells to stop them from becoming immortal.

programme.title: Pressure Point
programme.desc: Friday Night Lights meets The Social Network. Starring Oscar nominee Michael Shannon and featuring Alexander Ludwig (Vikings) and Charles Melton (Riverdale) is inspirational sports drama, Pressure Point...

programme.title: A 2nd Chance
programme.desc: A 2nd Chance is a children's and family film based around gymnastics. It's an inspirational feel good story about a young gymnast and her coach overcoming adversity for a chance to win a place in the national gymnastics team.

programme.title: A Perfect Day
programme.desc: Benicio del Toro & Tim Robbins star in this war zone comedy where a band of rescue workers are confronted with a crisis.

programme.title: Chloe & Theo
programme.desc: Chloe, a young woman who has been searching for something to believe in, is living on the streets of New York City. She comes face to face with an Inuit Eskimo named Theo, who was sent By his elders to send a message to humankind.

programme.title: Dreamin' Wild
programme.desc: What if a childhood dream suddenly came true - but thirty years later? That's what happened to singer/songwriter Donnie Emerson. His dream of success suddenly - and unexpectedly - came true but only as he approached 50 years old.

programme.title: The Way Back
programme.desc: The Way Back is the critically acclaimed new release from renowned director Peter Weir (Master and Commander, The Truman Show), starring Colin Farrell, Jim Sturgess, Ed Harris, Mark Strong and Saoirse Ronan.

programme.title: Submission
programme.desc: A cynical college professor, bored with his life and struggling with his second novel, takes a keen interest in a talented young female student. Before long, boundaries are crossed but who is the transgressor?

programme.title: The Big Short
programme.desc: When the banks committed the greatest fraud in US history, four outsiders risked it all to take them down. Based on the unbelievable true story and best-selling book from the author of The Blind Side and Moneyball, critics are calling The Big Short “brilliant and explosive”...

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: Brothers tells the powerful story of two siblings, thirty-something Captain Sam Cahill and younger brother Tommy Cahill, who are polar opposites.

programme.title: The Good Lie
programme.desc: Orphaned during the Sudanese Civil War, a group of young refugees are given the opportunity to leave their camp and resettle in America.

programme.title: Waiting for Anya
programme.desc: From the mind of world-renowned author Michael Morpurgo comes the cinematic adaptation of Waiting for Anya - a powerful and authentic true story of a young shepherd that had a key part to play in one of the world's most shocking moments in history.

programme.title: Prime
programme.desc: A career driven professional from Manhattan is wooed by a young painter, who also happens to be the son of her psychoanalyst.

programme.title: Pelé: Birth of a Legend
programme.desc: This biographical drama chronicles the life of one of the world's greatest footballers.

programme.title: Big Momma's House
programme.desc: FBI agent Malcolm Turner is known best for being a brilliant, master of disguise. Malcolm's latest assignment sends him to small-town Georgia, where he's assigned to trap a brutal bank robber who the FBI suspects will be coming down to visit his ex-girlfriend Sherry and her son.

programme.title: The Love Punch
programme.desc: THE LOVE PUNCH brings together Pierce Brosnan and Emma Thompson for the first time, as ex-husband and wife Richard and Kate whose biting banter suggests that the flames of their former relationship have not been fully extinguished…

programme.title: The Final Cut
programme.desc: In the future, a man with access to people's memories finds his life at risk when he discovers a dark secret.

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: Playing For Keeps is a romantic comedy about a former soccer star who returns home to put his life back together. Looking for a way to rebuild his relationship with his son, he gets roped into coaching the boy's soccer team.

What starts out as just another day on the job quickly turns into a life-or-death struggle for a soft-spoken American co-pilot when a group of terrorists attempt to take control of his Paris-bound flight.

programme.title: A Haunted House
programme.desc: In this outrageous spoof of "found footage" movies, young couple Malcolm (Marlon Wayans) and Kisha (Essence Atkins) have just moved into their dream house. As they settle in, they quickly find they're not alone. But it's not the house that's haunted, it's Malcolm's girlfriend!

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine
programme.desc: A group of middle-aged friends who are bored with their adult lives are transported back to their younger days in 1986 by a time-traveling hot tub.

programme.title: Monsters and Men
programme.desc: When young father Manny witnesses the police shooting of an unarmed black man, the tight-knit community of Bed-Stuy is pushed to the brink in Reinaldo.

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: In a future where time is literally money and aging stops at 25, the only way to stay alive is to earn, steal, or inherit more time.

programme.title: The Internship
programme.desc: Billy (Vince Vaughn) and Nick (Owen Wilson) are salesmen whose careers have been torpedoed by the digital world. Trying to prove they are not obsolete, they defy the odds by talking their way into a coveted internship at Google, along with a battalion of brilliant college students.

programme.title: Premier League Years
programme.desc: Take a look back at all of the most memorable moments from the 1995/96 Premier League season, with classic music from the time, major news headlines and more.

programme.title: Premier League 100
programme.desc: A look at the career of former Liverpool striker Robbie Fowler. A natural scorer, Fowler netted 162 Premier League goals, 128 of them for the Reds.

programme.title: Premier League 100
programme.desc: In the final episode of PL100 we sit down with Arsenal legend Thierry Henry who scored 175 goals in 258 appearances in the English Premier League.

programme.desc: George Banks (Steve Martin) and his wife, Nina (Diane Keaton), are the proud parents of Annie (Kimberly Williams), but when she returns from studying abroad and announces that she's engaged, their whole world turns upside down, especially that of overprotective George. From meeting the in-laws to wedding plans with an over-the-top consultant (Martin Short) and his flamboyant assistant (B.D. Wong), it seems as if the troubles never end in this update of the classic Spencer Tracy comedy.

programme.title: Father of the Bride Part II

Shaken by nearing this new milestone in his life, George soon has to process even more surprising news -- his wife, Nina (Diane Keaton), is pregnant too. Reeling from these revelations, George gets help from the eccentric Franck (Martin Short), who, conveniently, has moved from planning weddings to baby showers.

The problem is, any plan is only as clever as the brains behind it.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: Tired of always answering to others, Nick (Jason Bateman), Dale (Charlie Day) and Kurt (Jason Sudeikis) go into business for themselves. After demonstrating the prototype for an invention called the Shower Buddy, the guys attract the attention of Rex Hanson and his father, Bert. Bert invests in the trio's product, then cancels the order and steals their idea. Now heavily in debt and with no legal recourse, Nick, Dale and Kurt decide to kidnap Rex and use the ransom money to pay off their loans.

programme.title: Barbie
programme.desc: Barbie and Ken are having the time of their lives in the colorful and seemingly perfect world of Barbie Land. However, when they get a chance to go to the real world, they soon discover the joys and perils of living among humans.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The gang uses deception and betrayal to make it to the one open seat at Wil Wheaton's celebrity Dungeons and Dragons game with William Shatner, Joe Manganiello, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar and Kevin Smith.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When Penny and Bernadette go to San Diego for a pharmaceutical sales convention, Wolowitz is left in charge of the kids; Sheldon finds a book about experimenting on kids.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When competitors Pemberton and Campbell charm America on a publicity tour, Sheldon and Amy try to win over Nobel laureates Kip Thorne, George Smoot and Frances Arnold; Halley's fear of the dark leads to opportunity and conflict.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The weight of winning a Nobel Prize weighs heavy on Amy's shoulders; Koothrappali and Wolowitz try to relive the good old days after Wolowitz buys a scooter that looks like the one he had years ago.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Koothrappali is worried people won't take him seriously in his own field after publishing a paper that suggests he may have discovered alien life; Leonard wants to be the principal investigator on a plasma physics study.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Kripke has proof that Dr. Pemberton plagiarized his thesis in college, and Sheldon and Amy aren't sure if they should turn him in or not; Wolowitz learns that Bernadette wasn't the only waitress at the Cheesecake Factory who had a crush on him.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick (Jason Bateman), Dale (Charlie Day) and Kurt (Jason Sudeikis) are workers who would like nothing better than to grind their oppressive employers into the dirt. Quitting their jobs is not an option, so -- fueled by alcohol and dubious advice from a criminal (Jamie Foxx) -- the men devise a complex and seemingly foolproof plan to permanently rid themselves of their terrible bosses. The problem is, any plan is only as clever as the brains behind it.

programme.title: Live Once , Die Twice
