programme.title: Grandma Dearest
programme.desc: (2020) Thriller with Wendie Malick. Barbara longs to be a grandmother. In fact, she would kill for it. Can her new daughter-in-law expose her deadly intentions before it's too late?

programme.title: Mommy's Cheating Scandal
programme.desc: (2021) Thriller based on real-life events, with Karis Cameron. A student gets caught in an admission scandal in a bid to get into a good college. A manhunt for the ring leader has deadly consequences.

programme.title: Burning Lies
programme.desc: (2021) Tense psychological thriller with Annika Foster. A woman falls for a handsome firefighter who saves her life, but soon discovers that his overprotective nature can get obsessive - and deadly.

programme.title: Secrets of a Gold Digger Killer
programme.desc: (2021) Gripping thriller based on true events, starring Julie Benz. A femme fatale with a taste for riches pulls the strings on a deadly plot to have her multi-millionaire husband murdered.

programme.title: Snatched from Mommy
programme.desc: (2021) Heart-wrenching psychological thriller starring Chelsea Hobbs. When blogger Elizabeth's baby is kidnapped, she uncovers a betrayal that hits much closer to home than she realised.

programme.title: Breakout
programme.desc: (2013) Action thriller starring Brendan Fraser. When his children witness a murder, a father will stop at nothing to protect them from the killers hunting them. Also starring Dominic Purcell.

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: (2015) Action adventure with Clive Owen and Morgan Freeman. A medieval warrior emerges from exile to seek vengeance for his noble master, igniting a battle that will decide the fate of the kingdom.

programme.title: Jack Hunter And The Star Of Heaven
programme.desc: (2008) Action starring Ivan Sergei. When archaeologist Jack Hunter's mentor is killed, he must find the culprit and stop ancient treasure falling into the wrong hands.

programme.title: Hidden Truth
programme.desc: (2016) Intense thriller with Sarah Lind. After her brother is accused of murder, Jamie tries to clear his name, uncovering dark secrets and a killer who will do anything to get away with it...

programme.title: Killing Salazar
programme.desc: Six U.S. agents have to protect a key witness in a major drug case from being murdered by the drug dealers he is going to testify against. Starring Luke Goss and Steven Seagal (2016).

programme.title: Fatal Flatline
programme.desc: (2020) Thriller starring Julie McNiven. A grieving couple donates their dead daughter's organs. But the recipient of her heart exhibits a disturbing and sinister obsession.

programme.title: Robocar Poli
programme.desc: While Terry is carrying loads, his brake becomes out of order so he runs very fast on the roads. Can Poli and the Rescue Team help Terry stop?

programme.title: Robocar Poli
programme.desc: School B buys balloons for the children as entrance gifts. However, he fails to keep the balloons and loses the balloons into the sky. Can School B give his presents to the children?

programme.title: Robocar Poli
programme.desc: Mr. Builder starts repairing a water pipe. After pouring cement into the hole, he cautions that it must be guarded until the concrete has dried. However, Bruner isn't paying attention...

programme.title: Robocar Poli
programme.desc: Cleany is a narrow minded and quiet guy. One day, a small, injured cat is found! The Rescue Team asks Cleany to look after the cat until they find its owner but then Cleany becomes very attached...

programme.title: Robocar Poli
programme.desc: Today is the Regular Checkup Day. Spooky is too lazy to have a regular checkup. When Spooky comes to tow Posty to the electronic recharge station, fire comes out of Spooky's nose!

programme.title: Robocar Poli
programme.desc: There's a rumour going around: there's a ghost in Brooms Town's forest!

programme.title: Robocar Poli
programme.desc: School B is late and is worried about the children who are waiting for him. He looks for a short cut however, every road is blocked because of roadworks.

programme.title: Robocar Poli
programme.desc: Bruner feels envious that Poke gets praised for finding the old tire of the legendary car, Thunder. Bruner digs the ground in Mr. Wheeler's front yard hoping that he'll find something great.

programme.title: Robocar Poli
programme.desc: On a day with a lot of lightning, one of the wheels in Mr. Wheeler's store is stolen! As Poli investigates this case, everyone begins to stop trusting each other. Does Brooms Town have a thief?

programme.title: Robocar Poli
programme.desc: Helly is disappointed that no one remembers his birthday. Later, Poli and his friends feel sorry that they didn't remember and so they prepare a surprise party for him!

programme.title: Robocar Poli
programme.desc: Cleany overcharges himself at the electronic recharge station which is out of order. Cleany runs so uncontrollably fast. Can the Rescue Team stop Cleany?

programme.title: Shadow of Sartana
programme.desc: Sartana has a bounty on his head and he's wanted dead or alive. To eliminate this he makes a deal with the local politicians. If he hunts down the marauding Randal Brothers, the bounty will be removed.

programme.title: Massacre
programme.desc: A gang of gunrunners is pursued by Mexican Rurales and Yaqui Indians. The police want to stop the tribes from attacking farmers, while the Yaqui seek revenge for bad medicine that blinded their children. Both groups capture the criminals but find themselves trapped by angry tribes at a ruined mission. Can cops and criminals unite to survive?

programme.title: In Old New Mexico
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid and Pancho kidnap Ellen Roth, a woman accused of murder, and take her to a mission. She claims her innocence, revealing a mysterious doctor who caused a death. Cisco believes her and plans to expose the truth. He strikes a deal with Bill Hastings for part of an inheritance, but the stakes rise when a new plot unfolds.

programme.title: Requiescant
programme.desc: The adopted son of a preacher comes upon a village that is under the thumb of a deranged ex-Confederate officer, who is - among other things - stealing land from the locals with phony land grants.

programme.title: Fifteen Scaffolds for the Killer
programme.desc: Accused of a hideous crime they did not commit, the members of two rivaling gangs, persecuted by a bloodthirsty lynch mob, take refuge in an abandoned fort, taking two hostages with them.

programme.title: The Lone Ranger and the Lost City of Gold
programme.desc: Three Indians are murdered. Each was wearing a medallion when he died.

programme.title: Gunsight Ridge
programme.desc: Stage line agent investigates a series of robberies by taking the job of a deputy sheriff in a border Arizona town.

programme.title: Long Days of Hate
programme.desc: A bounty, Benson is hunting down a vicious outlaw gang, who killed his parents, brother and sisters, except for one sister, Susy, who he wants for himself!

programme.title: Promise
programme.desc: Ransom, a retired scout, must face his tragic past to find peace. Seeking answers about his lost love Tess and her daughter Promise, he learns of a hidden cash box tied to his past. As ex-Confederates and the dangerous Wildeye hunt for the treasure, Ransom and Promise join forces, navigating gunfights, betrayal, and an intense showdown.

programme.title: Panhandle
programme.desc: John Sands, a former Texas marshal turned fugitive, hides in Mexico after his gun skills made him an outlaw. When he learns his brother Billy, a crusading newspaperman, has been murdered in Sentinel, Texas, John risks his life to return north. Despite the bounty on his head, he's determined to uncover the truth and avenge his brother's death.

programme.title: Killer Goodbye
programme.desc: A young man goes back to his hometown ten years after killing the killer of his parents. Once there he is asked to help the sheriff.

programme.title: Gunfighters Die Harder

programme.title: SportsCenter With Scott Van Pelt
programme.desc: SVP's up at midnight and bringing his unique perspective on games people play to "SportsCenter" viewers. The hourlong, late-night show is driven by the host's self-deprecating wit and passion for sports, with featured elements, including Van Pelt's nightly "1 Big Thing" commentary and a weekly look back at the moments that drove bettors wild in "Bad Beats." The show also delivers what "SportsCenter" fans are used to -- news and highlights, guests and interviews -- but in a different, fast-paced and insightful way.

programme.title: Live: Unsportsmanlike with Evan, Canty and Michelle
programme.desc: Start the day off right with Chris Canty, Evan Cohen and Michelle Smallmon providing an energizing and informative way to take on the day. Sports, life and laughter are what it's all about.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter Americano
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides TV's most thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis.

programme.title: SportsCenter Americano
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides TV's most thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis.

programme.title: Live: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: Live: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith hosts this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: NBA Today

programme.title: College Football Live
programme.desc: Want to know up-to-the-minute reports about your favorite college football team? ESPN has it covered with this weekday studio show, a roundtable format that emphasizes discussion and opinions on the sport's biggest stories and newsmakers. The half-hour program features a rotating roster of analysts that includes coaches, former players, and media personalities.

programme.title: NFL Live

programme.title: The Path: LSU Football

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: Baseball Tonight
programme.desc: If you're a fan of baseball, then you won't want to miss this show featuring highlights of all the games and updates of ones still in progress. Regularly hosted by Karl Ravech, he's joined by a rotating panel of analysts that includes former players and managers, plus reporters such as Tim Kurkjian and Buster Olney. Other hosts include Adnan Virk and Jon Sciambi.

programme.title: E60
programme.desc: One of the rarest feats in all of sports: the perfect game. In-depth interviews with 15 pitchers in this unique MLB fraternity, from Roy Halladay to Felix Hernandez, dive into the drama and psychology of achieving baseball perfection.

programme.title: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: In a much anticipated game of the regular season, the Chiefs square off against AFC rivals Josh Allen and the Buffalo Bills.

programme.title: The Kingdom

programme.title: NFL Matchup
programme.desc: An NFL Films production, "NFL Matchup" is definitely a show for football junkies. Unlike traditional football preview programs, this one gives fans an in-depth look at some of Sunday's games by breaking down the strategy and tactics -- the Xs and Os -- through the exclusive use of team-supplied footage. That type of film study is a forte of former NFL player and executive Louis Riddick and NFL Films producer Greg Cosell, whose work is featured here alongside host Sal Paolantonio.

programme.title: Live: Fantasy Football Now
programme.desc: "Fantasy Football Now" airs live on Sunday mornings during the NFL season, a time when fans are making last-minute roster moves and need the latest news from around the league. Providing the latest info are host Field Yates, analysts Mike Clay and Damien Woody, and senior writer and injury analyst Stephania Bell. Also contributing to the show are ESPN's NFL reporters, who bring fantasy players the latest intel from game sites and, in many cases, straight from the coach's mouth to give fantasy owners everything they need to know to set their lineups.

programme.title: Der Prinz & ich
programme.desc: Prinz Albert ist gezwungen, eine doppelzüngige Dame anstatt seiner amerikanischen Verlobten zu heiraten…

programme.title: A Quiet Passion
programme.desc: Emily Dickinson, 1830 in Amherst, Massachusetts geboren, erfasste mit ihren gefühlvollen Gedichten auf unnachahmliche Art und Weise sowohl den Schrecken, als auch die Schönheit der Welt. Dabei hat sie davon selbst nicht viel gesehen. Nachdem ihr Vater (Keith Carradine) die gegen die evangelistischen Lehren rebellierende Emily (Emma Bell, Cynthia Nixon) schon früh aus der Schule nahm, verbrachte sie fortan die Zeit zusammen mit ihrem Bruder Austin und ihrer Schwester Vinnie in ihrem Elternhaus, das sie selten verließ. Sie hatte nur wenige Kontakte außerhalb der Familie und verbrachte Nacht um Nacht mit dem Verfassen von Gedichten. - 'A Quiet Passion' beleuchtet das Leben und die Werke der herausragenden Poetin, die mit einem außerordentlichen Intellekt, aber einer labilen Psyche ausgestattet war, in ihrer großen Schaffensphase.

programme.title: Eine zweite Chance für die erste Liebe
programme.desc: Kathy Yoder (Galadriel Stineman) hat ihr Leben in einer amischen Gemeinde hinter sich gelassen und reist als erfolgreiche Reiseführerautorin durch die Welt. Der Tod ihres Vaters führt sie zurück in ihr Heimatdorf – und damit in ihre Vergangenheit, die sie längst hinter sich geglaubt hat. Die früheren Freunde stehen ihr, 'der modernen Geschäftsfrau', die sich von der amischen Lebensweise abgewandt hat, allerdings sehr skeptisch gegenüber. Besonders ihre Schwester Miriam (Madison Lawlor) kann ihr nicht verzeihen, dass sie die Familie damals im Stich gelassen hat. Doch die alte Umgebung und die vertrauten Bräuche geben ihr ein lange nicht gekanntes Gefühl von Geborgenheit...

programme.desc: Diese packende Rock-Dokumentation erzählt die bisher ungehörte Geschichte der Oscar-nominierten Schauspielerin Juliette Lewis.

programme.title: Screenland S1 E1: Die Welt der Träume durch VR
programme.desc: Die Welt der Träume wird durch Virtual Reality greifbar - moderne Technologien ermöglichen Videospiele an die Grenzen der Vorstellungskraft zu bringen.

programme.title: Screenland S1 E2: Ein Twitch-Streamer über seine Sucht
programme.desc: Der Neustart eines Computers ist einfach, ein paar Klicks und alles läuft wieder. Doch was braucht es, um einen Menschen neu zu starten? Ein Twitch-Streamer kämpft gegen die Sucht und einen Neuanfang.

programme.title: Screenland S1 E3: Virtual Reality im Gaming
programme.desc: Gaming-Entwickler nutzen VR, um digitale und physische Welten zu verschmelzen. Von Portalen bis zu psychedelischen Reisen – diese Projekte verändern die Wahrnehmung der Realität.

programme.title: F1-Bolide bahnt sich Weg durch britischen Stau
programme.desc: Der RB7 im britischen Stau: Der legendäre F1-Bolide bahnt sich mit Tempo und Witz den Weg durch Taxis, Studentenautos und schräge Verkehrsteilnehmer – ein rasantes Rennen mit britischem Humor.

programme.title: Red Bull Rampage Frauen – BIKE
programme.desc: Red Bull Rampage 2025 bringt Big-Mountain-Freeride-Biking auf die Weltbühne. Zwölf Frauen battlen um die beste Bewertung. Schau live auf Red Bull TV und sei hautnah dabei.

programme.title: Screenland S1 E7: Spieleentwicklung mit John Romero
programme.desc: Der Mitgestalter von Doom, John Romero, hilft seinen Kindern bei der Entwicklung von Spielen, während Penn & Teller die Zensur mit Humor bekämpfen.

programme.title: Cuphead – Wie ein Indie-Game Geschichte schrieb
programme.desc: Vier Jahre Entwicklung, drei Weltrekorde und über drei Millionen verkaufte Exemplare: Die Entwickler von „Cuphead“ gewähren exklusive Einblicke in die Entstehungsgeschichte des preisgekrönten Games.

programme.title: Doku
programme.desc: Sie stecken ihr Blut, ihren Schweiß und ihre Tränen in ihr Handwerk, nur für die Fans. In Levels treffen wir einige der innovativsten und einzigartigsten Spieleentwickler der Welt.

programme.title: Doku
programme.desc: Assassin's Creed-Schöpfer Patrice Désilets startet sein bisher mutigstes Projekt – ohne Großstudio, mit kleinem Team, aber großer Vision. Ein Blick hinter die Kulissen seines neuen Game-Abenteuers.

programme.title: The Art of Street Fighting
programme.desc: Bekomme einen Einblick in das Leben der besten "Street Fighter V" Spieler auf ihrem Weg zu, grössten Kampf ihres Lebens. Die Geschichten von Xiao Hai, Daigo, Gamerbee, Tokido und Luffy zeigen, was es braucht, um es zum Red Bull Kumite zu schaffen.

programme.title: Red Bull Show 100
programme.desc: Ein mysteriöser Gast, "Fix net normal"-Release und das erste Mal große Bühne – Tag 4 im Camp mit AUT of ORDA.

programme.title: Red Bull Show 100

programme.title: Worldies S1 E14: 5 bizarre Events des Actionsports
programme.desc: Angefangen bei der Formel 1 über Klippenspringen bis hin zu allem, was dazwischen liegt - jedes dieser "Top-5"-Videos liefert die unglaublichsten Momente, Events und Athleten aller Actionsportarten!

programme.title: Doku
programme.desc: Unberührte Natur, wilde Tiere und weit weg von jeglicher Zivilisation: Die SEND-Crew begibt sich mit einer Elite-Kajak-Crew auf das ultimative Kajak-Abenteuer auf dem Ivindo-Fluss.

programme.title: For Reals S1 E4: Wingsuit-Action überm Vulkan
programme.desc: 245 km/h im Flugzeug durch den Tunnel, Wingsuit-Action über einem Vulkan, ein Truck-Sprung in der Geisterstadt – für Red Bull-Athlet:innen ist Extremsport einfach Alltag.

programme.title: Kletter-Doku: Stefan Glowacz entlang der Seidenstraße

programme.title: Space Jump: Das Vermächtnis von Felix Baumgartner

programme.title: For Reals (S1 E1): Skaten unterm Heißluftballon
programme.desc: Wakeskaten auf dem Wolkenkratzer, F1-Fahren auf dem Wasser, Skaten unterm Heißluftballon: "For Reals" zeigt in kurzen Clips, wie Athleten aus aller Welt die Grenzen des Möglichen ausreizen.

programme.title: For Reals S1 E7: Mit 246 km/h über die Tower Bridge
programme.desc: Wingsuit-Flüge mit 246 km/h über die Tower Bridge, Slacklinen in schwindelerregender Höhe, Schaukeln unter dem Heißluftballon – „For Reals“ zeigt spektakuläre Stunts aus der Welt von Red Bull.

programme.title: Candyman
programme.desc: Skeptical graduate student Helen Lyle (Virginia Madsen) befriends Anne-Marie McCoy (Vanessa Williams) while researching superstitions in a housing project on Chicago's Near North Side. From Anne-Marie, Helen learns about the Candyman (Tony Todd), a knife-wielding figure of urban legend that some of her neighbors believe to be responsible for a recent murder. After a mysterious man matching the Candyman's description begins stalking her, Helen comes to fear that the legend may be all too real.

programme.title: Jason Goes to Hell: The Final Friday
programme.desc: After being blown away by a team of FBI agents, Jason Voorhees (Kane Hodder) needs to find a way to overcome certain death. When his bloodied remains are sent to the morgue, his heart, still intact, is able to hypnotize a coroner and take over his body. After brutally dispatching a couple of FBI agents, he heads back to his favorite stomping grounds: Crystal Lake. Jason commences another teen massacre while a bounty hunter (Steven Williams) discovers the only way to kill him.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part VIII: Jason Takes Manhattan
programme.desc: Mass murderer Jason Voorhees (Kane Hodder) is resurrected from the bottom of Crystal Lake. After he kills a passing boat's occupants, he stows away on a cruise ship filled with a high-school graduating class bound for New York City. Biology teacher Charles McCulloch (Peter Mark Richman) is on board with his niece, Rennie (Jensen Daggett), who has visions of Jason drowning as a child. They escape his bloody shipboard rampage, but, when Rennie and Charles reach Manhattan, Jason is close by.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part VI: Jason Lives
programme.desc: Years ago, Tommy Jarvis (Thom Mathews) killed infamous hockey-masked murderer Jason Voorhees (C.J. Graham), and the intensity of the experience has landed him in a mental institution. To end his torment and achieve a level of closure, Tommy escapes from the hospital and heads to the graveyard where Jason is buried, intending to dig up the body and cremate it. But, before this total annihilation can occur, a freak electrical accident resurrects Jason from the dead, and the terror begins anew.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part VII -- The New Blood
programme.desc: Years after the strange drowning death of her father, Tina Shepard (Lar Park Lincoln) returns to the site of his demise, Crystal Lake. Her developing psychic powers were responsible for ending his life, leaving Tina riddled with guilt as an adult. While deceitful Dr. Crews (Terry Kiser) tries to manipulate her abilities for his own ends, both physician and patient are in for a shock when Tina's powers unwittingly free camper-killer Jason Voorhees from his watery slumber.

programme.title: Freddy vs. Jason
programme.desc: Two horror icons face off in this supernatural movie. Disfigured serial killer Freddy Krueger (Robert Englund), who attacks his victims in their dreams, has lost much of his power since citizens of his town have become less afraid of him. Enlisting the help of fellow violent murderer Jason Voorhees (Ken Kirzinger), Freddy orchestrates a new killing spree. However, when the hockey-mask-wearing psychopath won't stop chopping up Freddy's intended victims, the two ghouls start to battle each other.

programme.title: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: Crystal Lake's history of murder doesn't deter counselors from setting up a summer camp in the woodsy area. Superstitious locals warn against it, but the fresh-faced young people -- Jack (Kevin Bacon), Alice (Adrienne King), Bill (Harry Crosby), Marcie (Jeannine Taylor) and Ned (Mark Nelson) -- pay little heed to the old-timers. Then they find themselves stalked by a brutal killer. As they're slashed, shot and stabbed, the counselors struggle to stay alive against a merciless opponent.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part 2
programme.desc: The second entry in the long-running horror series focuses on a group of teenage would-be counselors converging on Camp Crystal Lake for training under the tutelage of head counselor Paul (John Furey). Inevitably, Paul relates the story of Jason Voorhees (Warrington Gillette), a boy who ostensibly drowned at the camp and whose mother murdered a group of counselors in revenge. No one takes the tale seriously until a very much alive Jason begins gruesomely eliminating people.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: The third installment in the "Friday the 13th" series picks up on the day after the carnage with homicidal maniac Jason Voorhees (Richard Brooker) stealing some clothes and killing a local store owner. Meanwhile, Chris (Dana Kimmell) and her sometimes boyfriend, Rick (Paul Kratka), are hosting a group of teenage friends at Chris' lake house. Despite a run-in with a local biker gang, they enjoy an amiable weekend together -- that is, until Jason begins knocking off kids and bikers alike.

programme.title: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.desc: Daryl and Paz in Barcelona; Carol and Antonio face the fallout of Solaz.

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.desc: The boys run a used chariot lot in Egypt.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: At the end of World War II, the Nazis attempt to open a portal to a paranormal dimension in order to defeat the Allies, but are only able to summon a baby demon who is rescued by Allied forces and dubbed "Hellboy" (Ron Perlman). Sixty years later, Hellboy serves as an agent in the Bureau of Paranormal Research and Defense, where he, aided by Abe Sapien (Doug Jones), a merman with psychic powers, and Liz Sherman (Selma Blair), a woman with pyrokinesis, protects America against dark forces.

programme.title: Pet Sematary Two
programme.desc: When his mother, Renee (Darlanne Fluegel), dies, young Jeff Matthews (Edward Furlong) moves back to his hometown with his father, Chase (Anthony Edwards). Jeff grows friendly with Drew Gilbert (Jason McGuire) at school, who tells him about the Indian burial grounds that bring people and animals back to life, which led to the deaths of the Creed family who used to live in town. Desperately missing his mom, Jeff ignores warnings and buries her corpse, only to have her return in deadly zombie form.

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: Doctor Louis Creed (Dale Midkiff) moves his family to Maine, where he meets a friendly local named Jud Crandall (Fred Gwynne). After the Creeds' cat is accidentally killed, Crandall advises Louis to bury it in the ground near the old pet cemetery. The cat returns to life, its personality changed for the worse. When Louis' son, Gage (Miko Hughes), dies tragically, Louis decides to bury the boy's body in the same ground despite the warnings of Crandall and Louis' visions of a deceased patient.

programme.title: Graveyard Shift
programme.desc: John Hall (David Andrews) is a drifter who wanders into a small town in Maine. He needs a job and decides to seek employment at the community's top business: a large textile mill. He is hired to work the "graveyard shift" -- from around midnight to dawn -- and, along with a few others, he is charged with cleaning out the basement. This task strikes the workers as simple enough, but then, as they proceed deeper underground, they encounter an unspeakable monstrosity intent on devouring them all.

programme.title: Thinner
programme.desc: Billy Halleck (Robert John Burke) is an obese lawyer who accidentally hits a Gypsy with his car after his wife distracts him. Given Halleck's influence in town and a general prejudice against Gypsies, he manages to brush the incident under the rug with some unethical legal help from his associates. However, the victim's father, Tadzu Lempke (Michael Constantine), places a curse on the heavyset man, and he starts to lose weight at an alarming rate, which is followed by other macabre events.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: High school can be tough for many teenagers, but for Carrie White (Chloë Grace Moretz), it's especially hellish. A shy and awkward teen being raised by a religious zealot (Julianne Moore), Carrie is frequently the target of bullies. But Carrie has a secret talent: She can make things move with her mind. One fateful night, an especially cruel prank at her senior prom pushes her over the edge, and Carrie unleashes her telekinetic powers on all who get in her way.

programme.title: It
programme.desc: Seven young outcasts in Derry, Maine, are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the town's children. Banding together over the course of one horrifying summer, the friends must overcome their own personal fears to battle the murderous, bloodthirsty clown known as Pennywise.

programme.title: Christine
programme.desc: Unpopular nerd Arnie Cunningham (Keith Gordon) buys a 1958 Plymouth Fury, which he names Christine. Arnie develops an unhealthy obsession with the car, to the alarm of his jock friend, Dennis Guilder (John Stockwell). After bully Buddy Repperton (William Ostrander) defaces Christine, the auto restores itself to perfect condition and begins killing off Buddy and his friends. Determined to stop the deaths, Dennis and Arnie's girlfriend, Leigh Cabot (Alexandra Paul), decide to destroy Christine.

programme.title: Misery
programme.desc: After a serious car crash, novelist Paul Sheldon (James Caan) is rescued by former nurse Annie Wilkes (Kathy Bates), who claims to be his biggest fan. Annie brings him to her remote cabin to recover, where her obsession takes a dark turn when she discovers Sheldon is killing off her favorite character from his novels. As Sheldon devises plans for escape, Annie grows increasingly controlling, even violent, as she forces the author to shape his writing to suit her twisted fantasies.

programme.title: Silver Bullet
programme.desc: When a series of unexplained murders occurs in the normally quiet town of Tarker's Mill, the residents decide to hunt down the killer. However, many of these vigilantes end up dead, and those who don't are no closer to finding an assailant. But, when a young wheelchair-using boy named Marty (Corey Haim) encounters a werewolf one night, the pieces begin to come together. Along with his sister and Uncle Red (Gary Busey), Marty begins a mission to capture the werewolf once and for all.

programme.title: Cujo
programme.desc: In this tale of a killer canine, man's best friend turns into his worst enemy. When sweet St. Bernard Cujo is bitten by a bat, he starts behaving oddly and becomes very aggressive. As Cujo morphs into a dangerous beast, he goes on a rampage in a small town. Stay-at-home mom Donna (Dee Wallace) gets caught in Cujo's crosshairs on a fateful errand with her son, Tad (Danny Pintauro). Stuck in their tiny car, Donna and Tad have a frightening showdown with the crazed animal.

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: Repairmen Val McKee (Kevin Bacon) and Earl Bassett (Fred Ward) are tired of their dull lives in the small desert town of Perfection, Nev. But just as the two try to skip town, they happen upon a series of mysterious deaths and a concerned seismologist (Finn Carter) studying unnatural readings below the ground. With the help of an eccentric couple (Reba McEntire, Michael Gross), the group fights for survival against giant, worm-like monsters hungry for human flesh.

programme.title: Child's Play
programme.desc: Gunned down by Detective Mike Norris (Chris Sarandon), dying murderer Charles Lee Ray (Brad Dourif) uses black magic to put his soul inside a doll named Chucky -- which Karen Barclay (Catherine Hicks) then buys for her young son, Andy (Alex Vincent). When Chucky kills Andy's baby sitter, the boy realizes the doll is alive and tries to warn people, but he's institutionalized. Now Karen must convince the detective of the murderous doll's intentions, before Andy becomes Chucky's next victim.

programme.title: Halloween III: Season of the Witch
programme.desc: Hospital emergency room Dr. Daniel "Dan" Challis (Tom Atkins) and Ellie Grimbridge (Stacey Nelkin), the daughter of a murder victim, uncover a terrible plot by small-town mask maker Conal Cochran (Dan O'Herlihy), a madman who's planning a Halloween mass murder utilizing an ancient Celtic ritual. The ritual involves a boulder stolen from Stonehenge, the use of Silver Shamrock masks and a triggering device contained in a television commercial -- all designed to kill millions of children.

programme.title: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers
programme.desc: The apparently comatose Michael Myers (George P. Wilbur) is being transferred from one hospital to another, but he wakes up when the ambulance crew talk about his surviving niece, Jamie (Danielle Harris). After slaughtering his attendants, Myers sets out to find his one living relative who is, fortunately, being cared for by a kind and resourceful foster sister named Rachel (Ellie Cornell). Meanwhile, the ever-cautious Dr. Loomis (Donald Pleasence) remains on the killer's path.

programme.title: Halloween 5: The Revenge of Michael Myers
programme.desc: After lying in a coma for a year, Michael Myers (Donald L. Shanks) awakens and stalks his way back to his small hometown in Illinois, intent on killing his niece, Jamie (Danielle Harris), who has been confined to a mental institution since Michael's last attempt to slay her. Suspecting a psychic link between Michael and Jamie, psychiatrist Dr. Sam Loomis (Donald Pleasence) joins forces with Sheriff Ben Meeker (Beau Starr) and attempts to stop Michael's latest rampage.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Nearly two decades after being committed to a mental institution for killing his stepfather and older sister, Michael Myers breaks out, intent on returning to the town of Haddonfield, Ill. He arrives in his hometown on Halloween with the indomitable purpose of hunting down his younger sister, Laurie. The only thing standing between Michael and a Halloween night of bloody carnage is psychologist Dr. Samuel Loomis.

programme.title: Halloween II
programme.desc: After failing to kill stubborn survivor Laurie (Jamie Lee Curtis) and taking a bullet or six from former psychiatrist Dr. Sam Loomis (Donald Pleasence), Michael Myers (Jonathan Prince) has followed Laurie to the Haddonfield Memorial Hospital, where she's been admitted for Myers' attempt on her life. The institution proves to be particularly suited to serial killers, however, as Myers cuts, stabs and slashes his way through hospital staff to reach his favorite victim.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: On a cold Halloween night in 1963, six year old Michael Myers brutally murdered his 17-year-old sister, Judith. He was sentenced and locked away for 15 years. But on October 30, 1978, while being transferred for a court date, a 21-year-old Michael Myers steals a car and escapes Smith's Grove. He returns to his quiet hometown of Haddonfield, Illinois, where he looks for his next victims.

programme.title: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.desc: Our heroes fight to protect the people they love.

programme.title: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.desc: Our heroes fight to protect the people they love.

programme.desc: Gordon explores the wilds of Wales to discover the rustic ingredients.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay: Uncharted Showdown
programme.desc: Gordon explores England's southwest coast to find culinary gems in his own backyard.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: High-speed bombing tests raise doubts about one student's place in the course.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Aircraft carrier landing is the most technical test yet for the students.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The students start the iconic dogfighting phase to learn how to attack.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Defensive dogfighting proves a tough test, as instructors go for the kill.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: With the finish line in sight, the students face their final and biggest test yet, as they go head-to-head in a dogfight against an instructor.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation [NEW]
programme.desc: The remaining students must dogfight an instructor to earn their wings; past failures mean it's their last chance to get it right.

programme.title: Superskilled with Eva zu Beck [NEW]
programme.desc: Eva carries heavy loads to the top of Kilimanjaro with a team of female porters.

programme.title: Superskilled with Eva zu Beck [NEW]
programme.desc: Eva attempts to survive on her own in the bush like the Hadza hunter-gatherers.

programme.title: The Substance
programme.desc: Fading actress Elisabeth Sparkle becomes distressed when her chauvinistic boss fires her from her aerobics show. She soon injects herself with a mysterious serum that promises a younger, better version of herself, but things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Look Into My Eyes
programme.desc: A group of New York City psychics conducts deeply intimate readings for their clients, revealing a kaleidoscope of loneliness, connection and healing.

programme.title: Kiss of the Spider Woman
programme.desc: In a prison cell somewhere in Latin America, two very different men warily confront each other. Molina (William Hurt) is first seen wrapping his head in a towel, in the shape of a turban, while Valentin (Raul Julia), bearded and classically macho in appearance, watches with a mixture of fascination and revulsion. During the time spent together, the two men come to understand and respect each other.

programme.title: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
programme.desc: Some British retirees (Judi Dench, Maggie Smith, Bill Nighy) decide to outsource their retirement to exotic -- and less expensive -- India. Lured by advertisements for the newly restored Marigold Hotel and imagining a life of leisure in lush surroundings, they arrive and find that the Marigold is actually a shell of its former self. Though their new home is not quite what they had imagined, the retirees find that life and love can begin again when they let go of their pasts.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: Now that Chris and his girlfriend, Rose, have reached the meet-the-parents milestone of dating, she invites him for a weekend getaway with Missy and Dean. At first, Chris reads the family's overly accommodating behavior as nervous attempts to deal with their daughter's interracial relationship, but as the weekend progresses, a series of increasingly disturbing discoveries leads him to a truth that he never could have imagined.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers unite to explore a mythical, uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean. Cut off from everything they know, they venture into the domain of the mighty Kong, igniting the ultimate battle between man and nature. As their mission of discovery soon becomes one of survival, they must fight to escape from a primal world where humanity does not belong.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: The Alabama Solution
programme.desc: In 2019, whispers from Alabama inmates spark a six-year probe into a prison system, exposing hidden brutality, corruption and a fight for truth and survival.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: An FBI agent heads a Task Force to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.

programme.title: The Big Lebowski
programme.desc: Jeff Bridges plays Jeff Lebowski who insists on being called "the Dude," a laid-back, easygoing burnout who happens to have the same name as a millionaire whose wife owes a lot of dangerous people a whole bunch of money -- resulting in the Dude having his rug soiled, sending him spiraling into the Los Angeles underworld.

programme.title: Practical Magic
programme.desc: Sally and Gillian Owens, born into a magical family, have mostly avoided witchcraft themselves. But when Gillian's vicious boyfriend, Jimmy Angelov, dies unexpectedly, the Owens sisters give themselves a crash course in hard magic. With policeman Gary Hallet growing suspicious, the girls struggle to resurrect Angelov -- and unwittingly inject his corpse with an evil spirit that threatens to end their family line.

programme.title: What's Your Number?
programme.desc: Ally Darling (Anna Faris) is realizing she's a little lost in life. Her latest romance has just fizzled out, and she's just been fired from her marketing job. Then she reads an eye-opening magazine article that warns that 96 percent of women who've been with 20 or more lovers are unlikely to find a husband. Determined to turn her life around and prove the article wrong, Ally embarks on a mission to find the perfect mate from among her numerous ex-boyfriends.

programme.title: The Whale
programme.desc: A reclusive English teacher, living alone in the wake of a tragedy, attempts to reconnect with his teenage daughter for one last chance at redemption.

programme.title: Queer
programme.desc: Lee, a solitary American in Mexico City, falls for a beautiful, elusive former soldier. Journeying together into the jungle, Lee sees, for the first time, the possibility of an intimate and infinite love.

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: Escaping postwar Europe, a visionary architect arrives in America to rebuild his life. On his own in a strange new country, a wealthy industrialist recognizes his talent -- but power and legacy comes at a heavy cost.

programme.title: Chronicle
programme.desc: Andrew (Dane DeHaan) is a socially awkward, introverted teen whose main form of escape and expression is a video camera. But things begin to change when Andrew, his cousin Matt (Alex Russell) and popular classmate Steve (Michael B. Jordan) discover a mysterious substance that leaves them with incredible powers. As their abilities become more powerful, the teens' lives spin out of control when their darker sides begin to emerge. Andrew's camera captures the unfolding events.

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: Jack Torrance (Jack Nicholson) becomes winter caretaker at the isolated Overlook Hotel in Colorado, hoping to cure his writer's block. He settles in along with his wife, Wendy (Shelley Duvall), and his son, Danny (Danny Lloyd), who is plagued by psychic premonitions. As Jack's writing goes nowhere and Danny's visions become more disturbing, Jack discovers the hotel's dark secrets and begins to unravel into a homicidal maniac hell-bent on terrorizing his family.

programme.title: Red Dawn
programme.desc: In an alternate 1980s, the United States stands alone as communism grows stronger. When Soviet soldiers invade a small Colorado town, brothers Jed (Patrick Swayze) and Matt Eckert (Charlie Sheen) escape with friends to the forest. With their father, Tom (Harry Dean Stanton), a prisoner of the invading army, the children decide to fight against the Soviets. As the country comes under increasing attack, the group teams up with Lt. Col. Andrew Tanner (Powers Boothe) to take back their town.

programme.title: An Intimate Evening With Adam Pally
programme.desc: Equal parts stand-up, documentary and rock concert, Adam Pally plays with the truth and his guitar in a one-time-only performance.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: Nick Morton is a soldier of fortune who plunders ancient sites for timeless artifacts and sells them to the highest bidder. When Nick and his partner come under attack in the Middle East, the ensuing battle accidentally unearths Ahmanet, a betrayed Egyptian princess who was entombed under the desert for thousands of years. With her powers constantly evolving, Morton must now stop the resurrected monster as she embarks on a furious rampage through the streets of London.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: Forced back into the field after a family tragedy, special agent Tom Brandis leads a new task force investigating a string of robberies.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: Tom's family prepares for an emotional court date; Robbie faces a dilemma; Maeve makes a crucial decision that might change everything.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: As Cliff and Robbie look for a buyer, Aleah and Lizzie question Peaches' former co-workers; Tom and Grasso pursue a lead.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: Tom questions the loyalty of his taskforce; Perry probes his own gang for answers and uncovers a shocking truth.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: With help from an eyewitness, Tom and his team inch closer to breaking the case; Perry pays Maeve a visit, while Robbie puts his plan in motion; later, Tom follows a lead that takes him down a dangerous path.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: An FBI agent heads a Task Force to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: When Superman gets drawn into conflicts at home and abroad, his actions are questioned, giving tech billionaire Lex Luthor the opportunity to get the Man of Steel out of the way for good. Will intrepid reporter Lois Lane and Superman's four-legged companion, Krypto, be able to help him before it's too late?

programme.title: Bring Her Back
programme.desc: A brother and sister uncover a terrifying ritual at the secluded home of their new foster mother.

programme.title: Interview With the Vampire
programme.desc: Born as an 18th-century lord, Louis is now a bicentennial vampire, telling his story to an eager biographer. Suicidal after the death of his family, he meets Lestat, a vampire who persuades him to choose immortality over death and become his companion. Eventually, gentle Louis resolves to leave his violent maker, but Lestat guilts him into staying by turning a young girl -- whose addition to the "family" breeds even more conflict.

programme.title: Opus
programme.desc: A journalist is invited to the remote compound of a legendary pop star who mysteriously disappeared 30 years ago. Surrounded by the star's cult of sycophants, she gets caught in the middle of his twisted plan.

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: In a future where time is money and the wealthy can live forever, Will Salas (Justin Timberlake) is a poor man who rarely has more than a day's worth of life on his time clock. When he saves Henry Hamilton (Matt Bomer) from time thieves, Will receives the gift of a century. However, such a large transaction attracts the attention of the authorities, and when Will is falsely accused of murder, he must go on the run, taking the daughter (Amanda Seyfried) of an incredibly wealthy man with him.

programme.title: The Iron Claw
programme.desc: The true story of the Von Erich brothers, who, through tragedy and triumph, under the shadow of their domineering father and coach, seek epic immortality on the biggest stage in sports.

programme.title: Friendship
programme.desc: A suburban dad falls hard for his new neighbor.

programme.title: This Means War
programme.desc: CIA operatives FDR Foster (Chris Pine) and Tuck (Tom Hardy) are inseparable best friends and partners. Together, their good looks, covert abilities and combat skills rank them among the CIA's elite, but their longstanding personal and professional bond is put to the test when they meet Lauren (Reese Witherspoon). FDR and Tuck both fall hard for the beautiful blonde, turning their deadly skills and an array of high-tech gadgetry against each other in an all-out battle for her love.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: Sworn to preserve intergalactic order, the Green Lantern Corps has existed for centuries. Its newest recruit, Hal Jordan, is the first human to join the ranks. The Green Lanterns have little regard for humans, who have thus far been unable to harness the powers of the ring each member wears. But Jordan, a gifted and cocky test pilot, may be the corps' only hope when a new enemy called Parallax threatens the universal balance of power.

programme.title: An Intimate Evening With Adam Pally
programme.desc: Equal parts stand-up, documentary and rock concert, Adam Pally plays with the truth and his guitar in a one-time-only performance.

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: A disposable employee is sent on a human expedition to colonize the ice world Niflheim. After one iteration dies, a new body is regenerated with most of his memories intact.

programme.title: Cleaner
programme.desc: Hoping to expose corruption, radical activists take 300 hostages at an energy company's annual gala in a high-rise building. Their cause soon gets hijacked by an extremist within their ranks who's ready to kill everyone. It's now up to a former soldier who works as a window cleaner to save the hostages trapped inside, including her younger brother.

programme.title: Death of a Unicorn
programme.desc: A weekend retreat has deadly consequences when a father and daughter accidentally hit and kill a unicorn while en route to find his billionaire boss, who seeks to exploit the creature's miraculous curative properties.

programme.title: Freaky Tales
programme.desc: An NBA star, a corrupt cop, a female rap duo, teenage punks, neo-Nazis and a debt collector embark on a collision course in 1987 Oakland, Calif.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: In 1976, a gunman dressed in black murders two people and wounds two more in the Texas mansion belonging to one of the victims.

programme.title: 48 Hours

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: S01/E120 Bad things happen to the people close to Robert Durst. His wife disappeared without a trace. His best friend was killed in her home.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: When drug-addicted casino owner Ted Binion turns up dead in his mansion, the suspects are pure Vegas: an ex-stripper girlfriend, a contractor who knew where his silver was buried, and a mob boss who launders money through his casino.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs

programme.title: Murderous Affairs

programme.desc: A convicted murderer escapes from prison after vowing to kill the FBI agents who helped to prosecute him.

programme.desc: An anonymous tip links the kidnapping of a jeweler with a bank robbery two months earlier.

programme.title: The FBI Files

programme.desc: The FBI tracks a lone gunman responsible for a string of unsolved bank robberies.

programme.title: Kind Hearts and Coronets
programme.desc: When his mother eloped with an Italian opera singer, Louis Mazzini was cut off from her aristocratic family. After the family refuses to let her be buried in the family mausoleum, Louis avenges his mother's death by attempting to murder every family member who stands between himself and the family fortune. But when he finds himself torn between his longtime love and the widow of one of his victims, his plans go awry.

programme.title: San Demetrio, London
programme.desc: Based on a real event, this stirring adaptation of F Tennyson Jesse's official account tells how a group of lowly British Merchant Navy sailors saved the San Demetrio oil tanker after it was almost destroyed by the enemy, braving fire and ocean to sail the vessel 900 miles to the safety of a Scottish port.

programme.title: Man in the Saddle
programme.desc: An angry rancher resorts to violence when he learns that his wife has fallen in love with another man.

programme.title: The Iron Petticoat
programme.desc: A humourless Russian, Captain Vinka Kovelenko, defects from her home country. Major Chuck Lockwood is assigned to show her the bright lights of London while she tries to convince him of the superiority of communism. Naturally, the two opposites fall in love but then must contend with the KGB, who are not happy with the idea of one of their officers running around free in London.

programme.title: Turner & Hooch
programme.desc: Detective Scott Turner is an uptight, by-the-book police officer who hopes to leave his sleepy California town and work in the big city. When his friend Amos Reed, the proprietor of a junkyard, is killed, Turner reluctantly inherits the man's dog. Realising that the canine may be able to help him solve the murder case, Turner attempts to adjust to life with the big dog, resulting in much household destruction and unwelcome chaos.

programme.title: Anna
programme.desc: Beneath a Russian woman's striking beauty lies a hidden secret that will unleash her indelible strength and skill and lead to her becoming one of the most feared assassins on the planet.

programme.title: The Black Phone
programme.desc: Finney is a 13-year-old boy who's being held captive in a soundproof basement by a sadistic, masked killer. When a disconnected phone on the wall starts to ring, he soon discovers that he can hear the voices of the murderer's previous victims.

He approaches the interview with skepticism, as he finds it hard to believe that anyone can have such a good nature. But Roger's empathy, kindness and decency soon chips away at Vogel's jaded outlook on life, forcing the reporter to reconcile with his own painful past.

programme.desc: Thriller set against the background of the gold rush in the Canadian Rockies. A man jailed for murder falls for the beautiful saloon singer who looked after his son while he was inside. He tries to conceal his criminal past from his son, but that is the least of their problems when the trio are left defenceless against rampaging Indians.

programme.title: Romancing the Stone
programme.desc: A romance novelist teams up with an adventurer in a South American jungle to ransom her sister with a legendary jewel.

programme.title: A Man Called Otto
programme.desc: Otto, a crotchety, irritable, and fiercely strict widower, lives a lonely life, judging everyone he sees. When he forms an unlikely friendship with his new neighbours, Otto begins to change.

programme.title: Military Wives
programme.desc: Following a group of women in England whose partners are away serving in Afghanistan. Faced with the men's absences, they form a choir and quickly find themselves at the centre of a media sensation and global movement. Inspired by global phenomenon of military wives choirs, the story celebrates a band of misfit women who form a choir on a military base.

programme.title: The Future
programme.desc: Sophie and Jason are in their mid-30s, childless and stuck in jobs that were supposed to be `just for now' - she teaches dance to kids, he operates an IT helpdesk from their shared home - but have seemingly set them on a road to nowhere. The realisation that, if they want to make something of their lives, they need to find direction hits with a jolt. One upshot is that they decide to adopt a down-on-its-luck cat.

programme.desc: A realistic and well-documented film re-enacting the events that led up to the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor, which plunged the United States into World War II. Boasting Oscar-winning special effects, the film gives both the Japanese and American perspectives on events and highlights some of the major and minor errors that were made on both sides.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently engaged woman becomes obsessed with meeting the grieving widower she heard on a late-night radio show. Sam, the widower, receives hundreds of letters following the radio phone-in which was instigated by his son Jonah.

programme.title: Ticket to Paradise
programme.desc: A divorced couple teams up and travels to Bali to stop their daughter from making the same mistake they think they made 25 years ago.

programme.title: Hangman's Knot
programme.desc: A band of Confederate soldiers capture a large consignment of Yankee gold, then go on the run with their haul when they realise that the war has ended. Although no longer threatened by the Yankees, they soon find themselves under attack from ruthless bandits determined to get their hands on the gold.

programme.title: The Iron Petticoat

Major Chuck Lockwood is assigned to show her the bright lights of London while she tries to convince him of the superiority of communism. Naturally, the two opposites fall in love but then must contend with the KGB, who are not happy with the idea of one of their officers running around free in London.

programme.title: Hell Is a City
programme.desc: A British police inspector waits for an escaped local criminal to return to his home in Manchester to pick up the spoils from his last job.

programme.title: Robin and Marian
programme.desc: The tale of Robin Hood and Maid Marian in their twilight years. Robin, back from the Crusades, finds his love has become the Abbess of a priory and that his arch enemy, the Sheriff of Nottingham still wants him dead.

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: Apocalyptic thriller in which life on Earth is threatened by a rogue comet. When a reporter in pursuit of a Washington sex scandal is arrested by the FBI, she discovers that the story is an inconsequential part of a huge cover-up. She soon finds herself in possession of the biggest story in the history of humankind, the planet will be destroyed in one year, unless a risky outer-space mission can deflect the comet.

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: Paul Edgecomb, the head guard of death row, just wants life for him, his colleagues and the condemned to be nice and easy. However, when John Coffee, a massive man convicted of brutally killing a pair of young sisters arrives, things start to get strange. Beyond his simple, naïve nature and a deathly fear of the dark, Coffey seems to possess a prodigious, supernatural gift. Paul begins to question whether Coffey was truly guilty of murdering the two girls.

programme.title: Open Range
programme.desc: Two free-grazing cattlemen, looking to live a peaceful life, find their peace is shattered and they are forced to ride for revenge when a ruthless rancher attempts to run them out of town.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemort's return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teacher's constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: The return of Lord Voldemort wreaks havoc in both the Muggle and Wizarding worlds. Harry suspects new dangers lie within Hogwarts.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledore's death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harry's home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestrange's clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledore's tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemort's soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix' vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: The year is 1926, and Newt Scamander has just completed a global excursion to find and document an extraordinary array of magical creatures. Arriving in New York for a brief stopover, he might have come and gone without incident, were it not for a No-Maj named Jacob, a misplaced magical case, and the escape of some of Newt's fantastic beasts, which could spell trouble for both the wizarding and No-Maj worlds.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents' deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potter's adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Magical Movies
programme.desc: From Harry Potter to Fantastic Beasts, Ella Enchanted to The Secret Garden. Discover a collection of magical journeys where destiny and wonder collide.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keeper's son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Mr Bean's Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesn't go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Save The Cinema
programme.desc: A Welsh hairdresser starts a campaign in the 90s to save her small town's theatre. With the help of a local politician, they manage to get Steven Spielberg to show a premier of 'Jurassic Park' in a bid to save the cinema.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: After his latest play flops, JM Barrie finds distraction when he befriends the Llewelyn Davies family, four young boys and their widowed mother Sylvia. His relationship with them threatens his marriage and standing in society, but results in the creation of `Peter Pan'.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keeper's son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Spoof spy caper with the eponymous, blundering hero attempting to recover the crown jewels and save Britain from an evil mastermind when all the other agents are killed. Promoted from lowly pen pusher to super spy, Johnny English is baffled when clues lead to respected entrepreneur Pascal Sauvage, but could the enigmatic Lorna hold the key to the mystery?

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncle's creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncle's secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them', which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Fred's being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prehistoric prequel in which working-class college friends decide to set off for a fun weekend in Rock Vegas with their two new girlfriends. One of them has a rival for the affections of his girlfriend as she is hit on by a wealthy playboy.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistler's Mother' painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Family adventure about two squabbling siblings who find a mysterious old board game in their basement. The bickering brothers discover the game has magical powers when a chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive.

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Endearing film version of Lionel Bart's successful stage musical based on Dickens's tale of the fluctuating fortunes of an orphan boy. Ron Moody stands out as the wily old scrounger Fagin in a series of well-crafted set-pieces and atmospheric musical numbers, and a tribe of child stars brings the 19th-century London underworld vividly to life.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl
programme.desc: Dreamer Max, ridiculed by his classmates, conjures up his perfect dreamworld - the Planet Drool, but his dream is more powerful than even he suspects, and his favourite dream superheroes, Sharkboy and Lavagirl, materialise on Earth. They bring news that an alien intelligence is threatening his beloved Planet Drool. Is it true, as Sharkboy and Lavagirl say, that only Max can stop it?

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A young kid teams up with the niece of young adult horror author RL Stine after the writer's imaginary demons are set free on the town of Greendale, Maryland.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Spoof spy caper with the eponymous, blundering hero attempting to recover the crown jewels and save Britain from an evil mastermind when all the other agents are killed. Promoted from lowly pen pusher to super spy, Johnny English is baffled when clues lead to respected entrepreneur Pascal Sauvage, but could the enigmatic Lorna hold the key to the mystery?

The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: There's trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptune's crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBob's boss, is the culprit. Though he's just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krab's life.

programme.title: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Unknown to humans, all-out war between cats and dogs has raged since the beginning of time. Now the cats face defeat if scientist Professor Brody can perfect a formula that will make all humans non-allergic to dogs. The cats' leader, Mr Tinkles, plans to steal the serum, but first he must get past fearless dog agent Lou who, thanks to a mistake in recruitment, guards the Brody family.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncle's creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncle's secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them', which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Washed-up stuntman Luo seeks help from his estranged daughter and her lawyer boyfriend when his beloved stunt horse may be auctioned off to pay his debts. Luo and Red Hare become a media sensation when their fight with debt collectors goes viral.

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: A wisecracking parrot caged in a research lab tells his life story to a lonely janitor. Before coming to the science lab, he has passed through the hands of a succession of owners, from a petty criminal to a man who runs a parrot-dancing act. Touched by his colourful story, the janitor conspires to liberate the talking bird.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Marvin is a Milwaukee realtor who receives a crimson envelope from a former partner-in-crime whom he left for dead. He now finds himself thrust back into a world of ruthless hit men and double-crosses that turn his open houses into deadly war zones.

programme.title: Grow
programme.desc: A young girl develops a growing bond with her no-nonsense aunt as they grow a giant pumpkin for the town's annual contest.

programme.title: Black Bag
programme.desc: When his beloved wife, Kathryn, is suspected of betraying the nation, intelligence agent George Woodhouse faces the ultimate test -- loyalty to his marriage or his country.

programme.title: The Stranger in My Home
programme.desc: Ali meets a mysterious man who claims to be the father of her teenage daughter, Katie. What begins as an unsettling encounter soon spirals into a nightmare of long-buried secrets, lies and obsession.
