programme.desc: The No. 7 Red Raiders visit the Sun Devils. Texas Tech prevailed 30-22 at home last season in its first meeting with Arizona State since 2017. Cam Skattebo, now starring for the NFL's New York Giants, had 177 yards from scrimmage and two TDs for ASU.

programme.title: The Blue Max
programme.desc: Lt. Bruno Stachel (George Peppard), a brash German World War I fighter pilot, is driven to shoot down 20 enemy planes, thus garnering him the Blue Max, a coveted medal. His superior, Count von Klugermann (James Mason), is aware that Bruno will stop at nothing to receive the honor, and admires his tenacity. The count's nephew, Willi (Jeremy Kemp), is Bruno's main competition for the prize, but Bruno is determined to eliminate his adversary and secure the honor for himself.

programme.title: My Blue Heaven
programme.desc: After discovering she is pregnant, Kitty Moran (Betty Grable) and her husband, Jack (Dan Dailey), are hurt in a car crash. Kitty loses the baby and is told the injuries from the accident may prevent her from conceiving again. On the advice of friends Walter (David Wayne) and Janet Pringle (Jane Wyatt), the couple decides to adopt, but their show business background makes orphanage director Mrs. Johnston (Laura Pierpont) wary. Desperate, Kitty and Jack turn to the black market for a baby.

programme.title: Holiday for Lovers
programme.desc: During a break, college student Meg Dean (Jill St. John) takes a month-long tour of South America, but then decides to remain six more weeks in Sao Paolo, Brazil, to study with architect Eduardo Barroso (Paul Henreid). Panicked, Meg's parents, Robert (Clifton Webb) and Mary (Jane Wyman), and flirtatious sister Betsy (Carol Lynley) travel to Brazil, where Robert suspects the mature Eduardo of trifling with Meg. Meanwhile, a young pilot falls for Betsy.

programme.title: Do Not Disturb
programme.desc: American Mike Harper (Rod Taylor), sent to do business in England, moves there with his wife, Janet (Doris Day). But she soon becomes convinced that Mike is carrying on with his attractive new assistant, Claire (Leon Askin). Mike also has been spending a considerable amount of time with his British bachelor buddies. Vexed and lonely, Claire hires charming antiques expert Paul (Sergio Fantoni) to decorate the Harper home and maybe make Mike jealous in the process.

programme.title: Dear Brigitte
programme.desc: Poet and professor Robert Leaf (James Stewart) has a disdain for the sciences. Unfortunately for him, his son Erasmus (Bill Mumy) is colorblind, completely tone-deaf and a natural math prodigy. While the professor tires to comes to terms with his son's predilection for numbers, the talented youth and his sister Pandora (Cindy Carol) use his math talents to win at the race track. Erasmus hopes to use the money he makes to fly to Paris and meet Brigitte Bardot, with whom he is infatuated.

programme.title: Modesty Blaise
programme.desc: A beautiful former criminal named Modesty (Monica Vitti) decides to go straight and so begins working for the Secret Service, which sends her to infiltrate a ring of jewel thieves. But soon after she joins the gang, dangerous head crook Gabriel (Dirk Bogarde) grows suspicious of his new recruit, and Modesty realizes that British Intelligence gave her a mission she wasn't meant to survive. She then enlists her former partner in crime, Willie (Terence Stamp), to help her outwit both sides.

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A professional assassin known only as Agent 47 (Timothy Olyphant) gets caught up in a dangerous political takeover. He flees across Eastern Europe, hoping to find out who set him up and why. However, his growing attachment to a beautiful but traumatized young woman poses as great a threat to his survival as that of the Interpol and Russian agents who are hunting him down.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: Genetically engineered from conception to be the perfect killing machine, he's the culmination of decades of research, endowed with unprecedented strength, speed, stamina and intelligence. Known only as Agent 47 (Rupert Friend), his latest target is a corporation that plans to unlock the secret of his past to create an army of killers even more powerful than him. With help from a young woman, the elite assassin confronts revelations about his own origins in an epic battle with his deadliest foe.

programme.title: The Happening
programme.desc: An apocalyptic threat to humanity arrives out of the clear blue sky with a series of violent, inexplicable deaths spreading across the country. The cause of the terrifying phenomenon remains unknown, prompting science teacher Elliot Moore (Mark Wahlberg), his wife Alma (Zooey Deschanel) and his colleague Julian (John Leguizamo) to try to elude the invisible killer in Pennsylvania's farmland. Soon it becomes clear that no one is safe.

programme.title: The Sixth Sense
programme.desc: Young Cole Sear (Haley Joel Osment) is haunted by a dark secret: he is visited by ghosts. Cole is frightened by visitations from those with unresolved problems who appear from the shadows. He is too afraid to tell anyone about his anguish, except child psychologist Dr. Malcolm Crowe (Bruce Willis). As Dr. Crowe tries to uncover the truth about Cole's supernatural abilities, the consequences for client and therapist are a jolt that awakens them both to something unexplainable.

programme.title: Poltergeist
programme.desc: All seems well for Eric Bowen (Sam Rockwell), wife Amy (Rosemarie DeWitt) and their three children as they move into their new house in the suburbs of Illinois. Soon, youngest daughter Maddy (Kennedi Clements) begins talking to an imaginary friend, or so the family thinks. It's not long before sinister spirits wreak havoc in the home, holding Maddy captive and forcing the parents to consult a team of parapsychologists who engage the supernatural entities in a battle for the girl's freedom.

programme.title: The Empty Man
programme.desc: A series of mysterious disappearances in a small Midwestern town may be linked to a supernatural entity.

programme.title: The Keys of the Kingdom
programme.desc: Orphaned as a child, Francis Chisholm (Gregory Peck) grows up to join the priesthood. He decides to become a missionary in China, and arrives to find the previous church burned down. Undaunted, he presses on, but doesn't initially fare well with the local populace. It's not until the child of a Mandarin falls ill that Chisholm proves his worth. Over time, he collaborates with a trio of nuns, endures several wars and, at the end of his life, returns to Scotland.

programme.title: A Woman's World
programme.desc: In order to select the new general manager of his auto company, Ernest Gifford (Clifton Webb) summons three strong candidates to New York, along with their wives. While Sidney (Fred MacMurray) and Elizabeth Burns (Lauren Bacall) have a strained relationship, Bill Baxter (Cornel Wilde) and his wife, Katie (June Allyson), are earnest and down-to-earth. Rounding out the competitors is the poised Jerry Talbot (Van Heflin), whose uncouth spouse, Carol (Arlene Dahl), threatens to derail his chances.

programme.title: The Iron Curtain
programme.desc: A clerk in the Soviet embassy in Canada after World War II, Igor Gouzenko (Dana Andrews) is increasingly troubled by his work for duplicitous government officials. Hoping to forge a better life for his wife, Anna (Gene Tierney), and their young son, Igor decides to defect. Though he's pursued by loyal Soviets who are charged with bringing him back to the Soviet Union, he provides Canadian officials with key documents detailing his government's underhanded efforts to obtain atomic bomb plans.

programme.title: Modesty Blaise
programme.desc: A beautiful former criminal named Modesty (Monica Vitti) decides to go straight and so begins working for the Secret Service, which sends her to infiltrate a ring of jewel thieves. But soon after she joins the gang, dangerous head crook Gabriel (Dirk Bogarde) grows suspicious of his new recruit, and Modesty realizes that British Intelligence gave her a mission she wasn't meant to survive. She then enlists her former partner in crime, Willie (Terence Stamp), to help her outwit both sides.

programme.title: Our Man Flint
programme.desc: When a global criminal organization flexes its power over weather and tectonic activity, secret agent Derek Flint (James Coburn) is summoned from retirement to get to the bottom of the matter. While he mulls over whether to take the assignment, he narrowly escapes an assassination attempt, but his spy agency commander, Cramden (Lee J. Cobb), is nearly mortally wounded. Vowing to take the fight to the enemy, Flint treks through Europe hot on the trail of femme fatale spy Gila (Gila Golan).

programme.title: In Like Flint
programme.desc: Former Z.O.W.I.E. spy Derek Flint (James Coburn) is called back from retirement after his former spy chief, Lloyd C. Cramden (Lee J. Cobb), is framed for prurient behavior with a prostitute, and U.S. President Trent (Andrew Duggan) experiences an incident of "lost time." After Flint discovers irregularities on a recently launched space-station mission, he realizes that an international conspiracy is afoot. He travels the world and assumes myriad disguises to unravel the nefarious plot.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: Genetically engineered from conception to be the perfect killing machine, he's the culmination of decades of research, endowed with unprecedented strength, speed, stamina and intelligence. Known only as Agent 47 (Rupert Friend), his latest target is a corporation that plans to unlock the secret of his past to create an army of killers even more powerful than him. With help from a young woman, the elite assassin confronts revelations about his own origins in an epic battle with his deadliest foe.

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: A man who loves when a plan comes together, Hannibal Smith leads a close knit team of elite operatives. Framed for a terrible crime, Smith and his men go rogue, using their special talents to clear their names and find the perpetrator. Hot on their trail is Charissa Sosa, who was once involved with a member of Smith's team and has sworn to capture them, no matter what it takes.

programme.title: Con Air
programme.desc: Just-paroled army ranger Cameron Poe (Nicolas Cage) is headed back to his wife (Monica Potter), but must fly home aboard a prison transport flight dubbed "Jailbird" with some of the worst criminals living. Along with Diamond Dog (Ving Rhames) and Baby-O (Mykelti Williamson), genius serial killer Cyrus "The Virus" Grissom (John Malkovich) unleashes a violent escape plot in mid-flight. Secretly working with U.S. Marshall Vince Larkin (John Cusack), Poe tries to foil Grissom's plan.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: When an asteroid threatens to collide with Earth, NASA honcho Dan Truman (Billy Bob Thornton) determines the only way to stop it is to drill into its surface and detonate a nuclear bomb. This leads him to renowned driller Harry Stamper (Bruce Willis), who agrees to helm the dangerous space mission provided he can bring along his own hotshot crew. Among them is the cocksure A.J. (Ben Affleck), who Harry thinks isn't good enough for his daughter (Liv Tyler), until the mission proves otherwise.

programme.title: The Abyss
programme.desc: Ed Harris and Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio are formerly married petroleum engineers who still have some issues to work out. They are drafted to assist a gung-ho Navy SEAL (Michael Biehn) with a top-secret recovery operation: a nuclear sub has been ambushed and sunk, under mysterious circumstances, in some of the deepest waters on Earth.

programme.title: The Blue Max
programme.desc: Lt. Bruno Stachel (George Peppard), a brash German World War I fighter pilot, is driven to shoot down 20 enemy planes, thus garnering him the Blue Max, a coveted medal. His superior, Count von Klugermann (James Mason), is aware that Bruno will stop at nothing to receive the honor, and admires his tenacity. The count's nephew, Willi (Jeremy Kemp), is Bruno's main competition for the prize, but Bruno is determined to eliminate his adversary and secure the honor for himself.

programme.title: The House on 92nd Street
programme.desc: In a story based on actual events, Nazi spies in New York City try to recruit German-American college student Bill Dietrich (William Eythe) at the height of World War II. Dietrich instead offers his services to the FBI as a double agent. Infiltrating the spy ring, which is headquartered in an East 92nd Street townhouse, Dietrich must contend with the house's beautiful owner (Signe Hasso) and, ultimately, a cache of smuggled atomic secrets that could derail the entire American war effort.

programme.title: The House on Telegraph Hill
programme.desc: Upon emerging from a Nazi death camp, Victoria Kowelska (Valentina Cortesa) takes the identity of a friend who died there. She travels to the United States where she meets her friend's son, Chris (Gordon Gebert), and discovers that she has come into a large inheritance. Eventually, she gets involved with the boy's guardian, Alan (Richard Basehart), and marries him. However, after some suspicious accidents, she starts to believe that Alan may be trying to kill her so he can claim the money.

programme.title: My Cousin Rachel
programme.desc: When Philip Ashley's (Richard Burton) wealthy cousin, Ambrose (John Sutton), dies suddenly, his suspicions drift to Ambrose's new and icy wife, Rachel (Olivia de Havilland), who stands to benefit greatly from his cousin's death. When Ashley is introduced to Rachel at Ambrose's funeral, however, his fears are immediately laid to rest: how could such a beautiful young woman possibly be a murderer? But when the estate is left to Ashley, he begins to fear for his life.

programme.title: Man in the Attic
programme.desc: Jack the Ripper's rampage has all of London gripped in fear -- no matter how many constables patrol the streets, streetwalkers continue to turn up dead. On the night that a fourth woman is killed, the mysterious Slade (Jack Palance) rents out the attic of William and Helen Harley. Later, he meets their niece, Lily Bonner (Constance Smith), an actress. While he intrigues her, his behavior and obsessions arouse suspicion that Slade could be Jack the Ripper -- and Lily his next victim.

programme.title: Hand of Death
programme.desc: A cloud transforms a scientist (John Agar) into a hideous, scaly monster that can destroy anything it touches.

programme.title: The Other
programme.desc: After their father dies, young twin brothers Holland (Martin Udvarnoky) and Niles (Chris Udvarnoky) spend their summer playing around the farm, while their mother (Diana Muldaur) hides in mourning. Holland is the more mischievous of the two, while Niles is shy and quiet. Their grandmother, Ada (Uta Hagen), has taught Niles how to project himself into other people and animals as a harmless game. But when a series of deadly tragedies strike the family and friends, only Ada suspects the truth.

programme.title: The First Omen
programme.desc: A woman starts to question her own faith when she uncovers a terrifying conspiracy to bring about the birth of evil incarnate in Rome.

programme.title: Us
programme.desc: Accompanied by her husband, son and daughter, Adelaide Wilson returns to the beachfront home where she grew up as a child. Haunted by a traumatic experience from the past, Adelaide grows increasingly concerned that something bad is going to happen. Her worst fears soon become a reality when four masked strangers descend upon the house, forcing the Wilsons into a fight for survival. When the masks come off, the family is horrified to learn that each attacker takes the appearance of one of them.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: It's been 40 years since Laurie Strode survived a vicious attack from crazed killer Michael Myers on Halloween night. Locked up in an institution, Myers manages to escape when his bus transfer goes horribly wrong. Laurie now faces a terrifying showdown when the masked madman returns to Haddonfield, Ill. -- but this time, she's ready for him.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: It's been 40 years since Laurie Strode survived a vicious attack from crazed killer Michael Myers on Halloween night. Locked up in an institution, Myers manages to escape when his bus transfer goes horribly wrong. Laurie now faces a terrifying showdown when the masked madman returns to Haddonfield, Ill. -- but this time, she's ready for him.

programme.title: Us
programme.desc: Accompanied by her husband, son and daughter, Adelaide Wilson returns to the beachfront home where she grew up as a child. Haunted by a traumatic experience from the past, Adelaide grows increasingly concerned that something bad is going to happen. Her worst fears soon become a reality when four masked strangers descend upon the house, forcing the Wilsons into a fight for survival. When the masks come off, the family is horrified to learn that each attacker takes the appearance of one of them.

programme.title: The Aging Brain
programme.desc: Learn what's behind mental decline with age, and how to improve memory, focus and concentration with NeuroQ's Darrin Peterson and Dale Bredesen MD.

programme.title: World's Dumbest ...
programme.desc: Angry girlfriend tries to run over boy; biker crashes seconds into his first lesson; driver double parks on top of another car.

programme.title: World's Dumbest ...

programme.title: World's Dumbest ...
programme.desc: Twenty of the world's dumbest partygoers, including a groom who faints, a music festival attendee who mistakes a urinal for a sink, a sunbather who mistakes his pants for his shirt, and a portly man who does an impromptu striptease.

programme.title: World's Dumbest ...
programme.desc: The most hair brained offenders.

programme.title: 21 Bridges
programme.desc: After uncovering a massive conspiracy, an embattled NYPD detective joins a citywide manhunt for two young cop killers. As the night unfolds, he soon becomes unsure of who to pursue -- and who's in pursuit of him. When the search intensifies, authorities decide to take extreme measures by closing all of Manhattan's 21 bridges to prevent the suspects from escaping.

programme.title: Safe House
programme.desc: When single mother Carole Taylor becomes a witness to a brutal murder of a heroin dealer, she is forced into the New Zealand witness protection program and used as bait to catch the killer.

programme.title: Django Unchained
programme.desc: Two years before the Civil War, Django (Jamie Foxx), a slave, finds himself accompanying an unorthodox German bounty hunter named Dr. King Schultz (Christoph Waltz) on a mission to capture the vicious Brittle brothers. Their mission successful, Schultz frees Django, and together they hunt the South's most-wanted criminals. Their travels take them to the infamous plantation of shady Calvin Candie (Leonardo DiCaprio), where Django's long-lost wife (Kerry Washington) is still a slave.

programme.title: Inside the 12
programme.desc: A look behind the scenes at the Big 12 Conference.

programme.title: Big 12 Uncovered
programme.desc: The Houston Cougars regroup after a tough loss to Texas Tech, channeling resilience and team spirit. Follow Coach Willie Fritz as he energizes his team for a road battle against Oklahoma State.

programme.desc: Sal, Q, and Murr slather on the charm for a commercial shoot before focusing on delivering some hard truths; finally, Chris Jericho turns heel on the losing joker.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers

programme.title: Impractical Jokers

programme.title: Impractical Jokers

programme.title: Impractical Jokers

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: NASCAR superstar Ricky Bobby is at the top of his game; adored by fans, a trophy wife by his side, and incredible wealth. But Ricky loses it all when French Formula One champion Jean Girard roars onto the scene. Ricky, with the help of his ruthless father, must pull himself out of the depths of despair and restore his honor on the racetrack.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick (Jason Bateman), Dale (Charlie Day) and Kurt (Jason Sudeikis) are workers who would like nothing better than to grind their oppressive employers into the dirt. Quitting their jobs is not an option, so -- fueled by alcohol and dubious advice from a criminal (Jamie Foxx) -- the men devise a complex and seemingly foolproof plan to permanently rid themselves of their terrible bosses. The problem is, any plan is only as clever as the brains behind it.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: Tired of always answering to others, Nick (Jason Bateman), Dale (Charlie Day) and Kurt (Jason Sudeikis) go into business for themselves. After demonstrating the prototype for an invention called the Shower Buddy, the guys attract the attention of Rex Hanson and his father, Bert. Bert invests in the trio's product, then cancels the order and steals their idea. Now heavily in debt and with no legal recourse, Nick, Dale and Kurt decide to kidnap Rex and use the ransom money to pay off their loans.

programme.title: Major League
programme.desc: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians, former showgirl Rachel Phelps (Margaret Whitton), has a sweetheart deal to move the team to Miami. But to break the lease with the city of Cleveland, ticket sales have to plummet. So Phelps hires the most incompetent players available, including near-blind pitcher Rick Vaughn (Charlie Sheen) and injury-prone catcher Jake Taylor (Tom Berenger). But her villainous tactics accidentally foster a can-do team spirit, turning the Indians into potential winners.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick (Jason Bateman), Dale (Charlie Day) and Kurt (Jason Sudeikis) are workers who would like nothing better than to grind their oppressive employers into the dirt. Quitting their jobs is not an option, so -- fueled by alcohol and dubious advice from a criminal (Jamie Foxx) -- the men devise a complex and seemingly foolproof plan to permanently rid themselves of their terrible bosses. The problem is, any plan is only as clever as the brains behind it.

programme.title: Cauchemar en cuisine
programme.desc: Le chef Philippe Etchebest se rend à Bertholène, une jolie petite commune située à quelques kilomètres de Rodez dans l'Aveyron. C'est Marie, cheffe de cuisine, qui a fait appel à lui. Elle travaille avec son fils Emmanuel, qui a repris le seul restaurant du village il y a 6 ans. Si à leurs débuts l'affaire fonctionnait bien, aujourd'hui les clients ont déserté l'établissement.

programme.title: Scènes de ménages
programme.desc: Votre couple vous désole ? Vous vous lamentez de vivre seul ? Scènes de Ménages va vous aider à relativiser !

programme.title: Cauchemar en cuisine
programme.desc: Au fur et à mesure de la découverte des lieux du restaurant de Marie et Emmanuel, Philippe Etchebest se demande comment il va pouvoir redresser la situation, tant les problèmes se sont accumulés avec le temps. A Bertholène, le chef va devoir la jouer fine pour sauver le restaurant local. De plus, Philippe Etchebest finit par comprendre qu'un élément peut peut-être tout changer au final.

programme.title: Tous en cuisine, en direct avec Cyril Lignac
programme.desc: Cyril Lignac s'invite chez vous pour vous faire redécouvrir le plaisir de cuisiner en famille. Place à la cuisine du week-end pour prendre le temps de mijoter de bons petits plats en famille, sans stress et avec beaucoup de plaisir. Au menu : blanquette, pot-au-feu, couscous ou ratatouille. Des plats généreux qui feront le bonheur des grandes tablées et réchaufferont les cœurs. Préparez-vous à un festival de saveurs avec des recettes conviviales et réconfortantes.

programme.title: Le 19.45
programme.desc: Le journal de M6.

programme.title: L'amour est dans le pré
programme.desc: Dans l'Aveyron, Mathieu reçoit Marie et Clémence. Les deux jeunes femmes savent qu'elles ont tout à apprendre à l'agriculteur, qui n'a jamais connu d'histoires de coeur. Clément et Florent, eux, ont été conviés chez Célia. Pour les deux Jean-Louis, il est sans doute venu le moment de faire un choix.

programme.title: L'amour est dans le pré
programme.desc: Dans certaines exploitations, il est temps pour les agriculteurs de décider auquel de leurs hôtes va leur préférence. Chez d'autres, l'heure est encore à la découverte, et les soupirants doivent redoubler d'attention pour ne pas se faire piéger par leur rival.

programme.title: L'amour vu du pré
programme.desc: Les agriculteurs de la saison 20, avec parmi eux Gilles, Julien, Jean-Louis et Océane, retrouvent les anciens candidats et chacun revit les temps forts de son aventure sentimentale, entouré de ses proches. Les figures des saisons passées sont également de la partie, partageant leur vécu et leur regard sur cette rétrospective pleine de sincérité. Entre éclats de rire, confidences touchantes et instants vrais, il y a toujours de la magie vu du pré.

programme.title: Et si on se rencontrait ?
programme.desc: Des couples qui ont fait connaissance à distance se rencontrent pour la première fois. Le passage du fantasmes à la réalité est un cap difficile à franchir.

programme.title: Et si on se rencontrait ?
programme.desc: Sans jamais s'être rencontrés, des gens, qui ont fait connaissance en ligne sont tombés amoureux. Depuis quelques mois ou plusieurs années, ils vivent une relation passionnelle mais virtuelle. Au château de Villiers-le-Mahieu, ils vont se voir pour la première fois en vrai, une concrétisation qui en effraie plus d'un.

programme.title: Programmes de la nuit
programme.desc: A suivre, des rediffusions des émissions de la chaîne, ainsi que des documentaires et autres reportages destinés à divertir les couche-tard comme les lève-tôt A suivre, des rediffusions des émissions de la chaîne, ainsi que des documentaires et autres reportages destinés à divertir les couche-tard comme les lève-tôt.

programme.title: Scènes de ménages
programme.desc: Loin d'être un long fleuve tranquille, la vie de couple est émaillée de conflits, de disputes et de réconciliations, comme en témoigne le quotidien de quatre d'entre eux. Parmi eux, les trentenaires Cédric et Marion, qui se surnomment mutuellement "poussin", les jeunes parents Emma et Fabien, récemment installés à la campagne avec leur petite Chloé, José et Liliane, mariés depuis plus de vingt ans, sans oublier les inénarrables Huguette et Raymond, des retraités à la méchanceté gratuite. Librement adapté de la série espagnole "Escenas de matrimonio", ce programme court évoque avec humour les hauts et les bas de la vie de couple Loin d'être un long fleuve tranquille, la vie de couple est émaillée de conflits, de disputes et de réconciliations, comme en témoigne le quotidien de quatre d'entre eux. programme.title: Scènes de ménages
programme.desc: Après une demande en mariage mémorable, Emma et Fabien préparent le grand jour où ils se diront enfin oui. Camille, forte du succès de son centre de bien-être, pourrait bien finir par détrôner Philippe et ses deux pharmacies. Un tournant professionnel se dessinera également pour José et Liliane : et si après la mairie, il y avait un autre horizon pour José ? Quant à Sofiane et Alice, la frénésie de leur épicerie ne leur laissera aucun repos. Du repos, c'est bien ce qui pourrait faire peur à Léo et Leslie, qui passent le cap des 30 ans. Les couples n'en finissent pas d'étonner les téléspectateurs dans une 17e saison enjouée Après une demande en mariage mémorable, Emma et Fabien préparent le grand jour où ils se diront enfin oui. Camille, forte du succès de son centre de bien-être, pourrait bien finir par détrôner Philippe et ses deux pharmacies. programme.title: Cash in the Attic
programme.desc: Jules Hudson and expert appraiser Paul Hayes are in Prestatyn, treasure-hunting with Diane. Having travelled the world as a teacher of English as a foreign language, Diane has gone back to her roots to the town where she was raised where she now runs an Air BnB. Diane is an inveterate collector and her home is stuffed with treasures that include a painting from her father, some Asian vases, jewellery, ceramics and glassware. There's no shortage of things for Jules and appraiser Paul to rummage through, but will there be any valuables to be found? Diane would like to find the money to splash out on a dancing holiday in Spain and make her contribution to her son's upcoming wedding. But will the sales at auction be enough to raise the money for both these dreams?

programme.title: Blackwater Lane
programme.desc: Late one night a woman drives by a stranded motorist who is later revealed to have been murdered. After a series of terrifying events the woman believes she is the killer's next victim.

programme.title: Leatherface
programme.desc: A teenage Leatherface escapes from a mental hospital with three other inmates, kidnapping a young nurse and taking her on a road trip from hell, while being pursued by a lawman out for revenge.

programme.title: The Prodigy
programme.desc: Sarah and John Blume are thrilled when their young son Miles starts to show signs of rapid development and extreme intelligence. Their family bliss soon turns into a living nightmare when Miles' behavior becomes increasingly erratic and violent by his eighth birthday. After seeking help from two experts, Sarah is horrified to learn that her beloved prodigy may be under the grip of a dark and supernatural force.

programme.title: Blackwater Lane
programme.desc: Late one night a woman drives by a stranded motorist who is later revealed to have been murdered. After a series of terrifying events the woman believes she is the killer's next victim.

programme.title: Clara's Ghost
programme.desc: Clara, fed up with the constant ribbing from her self-absorbed showbiz family, finds guidance from the supernatural force she believes is haunting her.

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: Upset about moving from the big city to a small town, young Zach Cooper (Dylan Minnette) finds a silver lining when he meets his beautiful neighbor Hannah (Odeya Rush). The teen is surprised to learn that Hannah's mysterious father is R.L. Stine (Jack Black), the famous author of the best-selling "Goosebumps" series. When Zach accidentally unleashes the monsters from the fantastic tales, it's up to Stine, his daughter and Cooper to return the beasts back to the books where they belong.

programme.title: The Black Phone
programme.desc: Finney Shaw is a shy but clever 13-year-old boy who's being held in a soundproof basement by a sadistic, masked killer. When a disconnected phone on the wall starts to ring, he soon discovers that he can hear the voices of the murderer's previous victims -- and they are dead set on making sure that what happened to them doesn't happen to Finney.

programme.title: Knock at the Cabin
programme.desc: While vacationing at a remote cabin in the woods, a young girl and her parents are taken hostage by four armed strangers who demand they make an unthinkable choice to avert the apocalypse. Confused, scared and with limited access to the outside world, the family must decide what they believe before all is lost.

programme.title: The Purge: Anarchy
programme.desc: One night per year, the government sanctions a 12-hour period in which citizens can commit any crime they wish -- including murder -- without fear of punishment or imprisonment. Leo, a sergeant who lost his son, plans a vigilante mission of revenge during the mayhem. However, instead of a death-dealing avenger, he becomes the unexpected protector of four innocent strangers who desperately need his help if they are to survive the night.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A janitor mischievously puts on a helmet which really is a time machine.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A small-time hoodlum gets killed by the police during a robbery and finds an afterlife where he can have anything he wants.

programme.title: Clara's Ghost
programme.desc: Clara, fed up with the constant ribbing from her self-absorbed showbiz family, finds guidance from the supernatural force she believes is haunting her.

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: Upset about moving from the big city to a small town, young Zach Cooper (Dylan Minnette) finds a silver lining when he meets his beautiful neighbor Hannah (Odeya Rush). The teen is surprised to learn that Hannah's mysterious father is R.L. Stine (Jack Black), the famous author of the best-selling "Goosebumps" series. When Zach accidentally unleashes the monsters from the fantastic tales, it's up to Stine, his daughter and Cooper to return the beasts back to the books where they belong.

programme.title: The Blair Witch Project
programme.desc: Found video footage tells the tale of three film students (Heather Donahue, Joshua Leonard, Michael C. Williams) who've traveled to a small town to collect documentary footage about the Blair Witch, a legendary local murderer. Over the course of several days, the students interview townspeople and gather clues to support the tale's veracity. But the project takes a frightening turn when the students lose their way in the woods and begin hearing horrific noises.

programme.title: The Craft: Legacy
programme.desc: An eclectic foursome of aspiring teenage witches get more than they bargained for as they lean into their newfound powers.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Now in his fifth year at Hogwarts, Harry learns that many in the wizarding community do not know the truth of his encounter with Lord Voldemort. Cornelius Fudge, minister of Magic, appoints his toady, Dolores Umbridge, as Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher, for he fears that professor Dumbledore will take his job. But her teaching is deficient and her methods, cruel, so Harry prepares a group of students to defend the school against a rising tide of evil.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: As Death Eaters wreak havoc in both Muggle and Wizard worlds, Hogwarts is no longer a safe haven for students. Though Harry suspects there are new dangers lurking within the castle walls, Dumbledore is more intent than ever on preparing the young wizard for the final battle with Voldemort. Teenage hormones run rampant through Hogwarts, presenting a different sort of danger. Love may be in the air, but tragedy looms and Hogwarts may never be the same again.

programme.title: Drag Me to Hell
programme.desc: Christine Brown has a loving boyfriend and a good job at a Los Angeles bank. Her heavenly life becomes hellish when, in an effort to impress her boss, she denies an old woman's request for an extension on her home loan. In retaliation, the crone places a curse on Christine, threatening her soul with eternal damnation. Christine seeks a psychic's help to break the curse, but the price to save her soul may be more than she can pay.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A garrulous man, bet half a million dollars that he can't keep silent for one year, goes to bizarre lengths to win the wager.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An airline official tests his theory that a newly arrived but totally empty plane is imaginary-with startling results.

programme.title: The Outfit
programme.desc: Leonard is an English tailor who makes suits on London's Savile Row. He must outsmart a group of criminals to survive a fateful night.

programme.title: Silent House
programme.desc: Sarah (Elizabeth Olsen) is working with her father (Adam Trese) and uncle (Eric Sheffer Stevens) to renovate an old family home to prepare it for sale. Long vacant, the house has no utilities, forcing the trio to rely on battery-operated lanterns to light their way. Sarah becomes separated from her relatives and soon finds she is trapped inside the cabin, with no contact with the outside world. Panic turns to real terror as the young woman experiences events that become increasingly ominous.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Now in his fifth year at Hogwarts, Harry learns that many in the wizarding community do not know the truth of his encounter with Lord Voldemort. programme.title: Avengers: Infinity War
programme.desc: Iron Man, Thor, the Hulk and the rest of the Avengers unite to battle their most powerful enemy yet -- the evil Thanos. On a mission to collect all six Infinity Stones, Thanos plans to use the artifacts to inflict his twisted will on reality. The fate of the planet and existence itself has never been more uncertain as everything the Avengers have fought for has led up to this moment.

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: Photographer Adam Stanheight (Leigh Whannell) and oncologist Lawrence Gordon (Cary Elwes) regain consciousness while chained to pipes at either end of a filthy bathroom. As the two men realize they've been trapped by a sadistic serial killer nicknamed "Jigsaw" and must complete his perverse puzzle to live, flashbacks relate the fates of his previous victims. Meanwhile, Dr. Gordon's wife (Monica Potter) and young daughter (Makenzie Vega) are forced to watch his torture via closed-circuit video.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Clumsy Smurfs The Future: What a strange stone Clumsy has unearthed! In it, he can see events that are going to happen... Yet knowing part of the future sometimes brings bad luck!

programme.title: The Smurfs

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Mere Truffle: The Smurfs love truffles but truffles belong to the Trolls and the Trolls live under Truffle Troll Mountain, where in the shadows of the lake lurks the Thing with No Name...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa's Wedding Day: When the flower fairy Nymph arrives at the Smurf Village, all the Smurfs fall for her charm and wit. And soon they learn that she is to be some sort of Mama Smurf to them...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfs At Sea: Papa Smurf recalls Dreamy's exciting voyage on the high seas and his gripping adventures with sea turtles, whales, desert islands... and pirates!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - All's Smurfy That Ends Smurfy: Gargamel's theft of the Fairies' gold almost brings a state of war between the Fairies and the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Adventures Of Robin Smurf: The Smurfs' theatrical production of 'Robin Smurf' comes to life as the legendary hero is portrayed by a really good actor...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Tear Of A Smurf: A beautiful princess is turned into a hag and needs the whiskers of a cat and the tear of a Smurf for her magic potion. Azrael, Grouchy and Jokey unwittingly cooperate and as the magical transformation takes place, the princess frees them and they happily hurry home.

programme.title: How To Smurf A Rainbow
programme.desc: Mother Nature is too busy to conjure a rainbow for the Smurfs' festival, so Papa Smurf borrows her cookbook and mixes up the recipe himself. As there is no yellow available, they use the leprechaun's gold to produce a beautiful rainbow before Gargamel can steal it.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Chip Off The Old Smurf: Disaster strikes when Brainy and Baby mix up Papa Smurf's formulas, leaving them powerless before an army of hungry locusts unleashed on the forest by Gargamel.

programme.title: Lumbering Smurfs
programme.desc: Greedy tree cutters plan to chop down King Gerard's forest while he is away on vacation. Papa Smurf disguises the Smurfs as ghosts to scare the lumberjacks who willingly surrender to the returning King and his array.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Hovel Is Not A Home: In his search for a grander hovel, Gargamel looks in the Great Book of Spells to conjure up a new home. But all of his spells backfire and that convinces him that there's no place like home!

programme.title: Speak For Yourself, Farmer Smurf
programme.desc: Farmer hides his love for Smurfette by assuming a disguise and sending her poems. When they finally meet, they are captured by Bigmouth and in their struggle to get free, they discover their mutual friendship.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Hefty's Heart: Gargamel infects Hefty's heart with hate and then uses the little Smurf as a decoy for the others. Fortunately, Hefty's love overcomes his hate and he helps his little friends escape from Gargamel's clutches.

programme.title: To Smurf A Thief
programme.desc: The Smurfs and Homnibus befriend an unfortunate boy who is forced to steal for his master. Soon, the evil thief is turned over to the magistrate and the boy is happy to live with Homnibus.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Forget-Me-Smurfs: Little Sickly turns into a hero when he forgets his ailments and saves the rest of the Smurfs from the deadly forget-me flowers.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Willpower Smurfs: The Smurfs are so busy testing their individual willpower that they fail to notice Gargamel has captured Harmony. Only when Papa Smurf offers Gargamel a trick box to test his willpower does Harmony escape.

programme.title: Clumsy Luck
programme.desc: The Smurfs learn about superstition when Clumsy breaks Vanity's mirror prior to a meteor shower. When a meteor falls on Clumsy's house, everyone attributes it to bad luck, but realize the foolishness of this philosophy when they see Clumsy was not in the house at the time.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Greedy And The Porridge Pot: The good fairy, Guinilda gives Greedy a magic porridge pot that Brainy causes to overflow into the village and forest. The good-hearted fairy hurries to the rescue and then asks for the pot back to give to an orphanage of hungry children.

programme.title: Vanity's Closest Friend
programme.desc: To Vanity Smurf there is no spectacle more enlightening, no pursuit more rewarding than looking at himself. When he meets an admiring imp, he's sure he's found his best friend ever. But things are not always that simple, and friends can make trouble.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Castaway Smurfs: Everyday the same routine, the same chores, the same life. Smurfette is bored with it all. Wouldn't a long sailing trip on the high seas be a lot more fun? It just so happens that Dreamy Smurf is planning a cruise. Won't that be paradise?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Clockwork's Power Play: Clockwork becomes too hot handle when he's hit by lightning. Papa has to hurry to cool him off before he burns himself out. But Clockwork nearly uses his last volt of power saving the Smurfs from Gargamel.

programme.title: Smoogle Sings The Blues
programme.desc: Chlorhydris plots to change spring into the unhappiest time of year. She goes after the Bluebird of Happiness, and transforms him into a cawing raven. Whoever hears the Song of the Raven of Unhappiness will be unhappy. It's up to Grouchy to save spring.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Every Picture Smurfs A Story: The evil Maestro's magical paints have the power to transport his models onto canvas – forever! Papa Smurf directs Painter to switch his paints and before long, Maestro is enshrined in a picture next to his dream girl, Smurfette.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Golden Smurf Award: Hogatha disguises herself as the Golden Smurf Award to catch the Smurfs in order to use them as the main ingredient in her beauty cream. Vanity convinces her to try his recipe and before long, the wicked sorceress is covered with mud and sent careening over the hills into Gargamel's house.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Last Smurfberry: Papa Smurf organizes a crew to sail to Smurfberry Island because Gargamel has killed all of the trees except one to trap the Smurfs. Gargamel follows them, but once more fails to catch them because the Witch of Smurfberry Island sends her nose-eating seagulls after them.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Miracle Smurfer: The Smurfs learn that the mind is more powerful than matter when they are fooled by a quack's outrageously expensive miracle tonic. But Papa Smurf cures the Smurfs of their temporary naiveté and the charlatan of his villainy.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - All Hallowseve: While out on a mischief-making mission to destroy the Smurfs' Happy Halloween party, Gargamel and Hogatha catch Lazy who has been accidentally turned red by Mother Nature. Papa and the Smurfs help Lazy escape while Mother Nature has Father Time help turn Lazy's red into blue just in time for the Halloween party.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Noble Stag: His wicked cousin, Malcolm the Mean, who plans to kill him and mount him in his trophy room, has turned King Gerard into a black stag. The little Smurfs help their friend. When King Gerard is transformed back into his human form, Malcolm becomes imprisoned in the body of the stag.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Waste Not, Smurf Not: Growing, harvesting and preparing food takes up much of the Smurfs' time. Handy invents a machine that farms and processes food. But this wonderful invention has its drawbacks...

programme.title: S-Shivering S-Smurfs
programme.desc: Winter has come all of a sudden. The Smurfs are almost all victims of smurfmonia. Can Tracker Smurf find the healing smurfroot without falling into the evil Gargamel's traps?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Squeaky: This is the dramatic, moving story of the friendship between Smurfette and her pet mouse. A sad event reduces Smurfette to tears... Can the Smurfs comfort the despairing Smurfette?

programme.title: It Came From Outer Smurf
programme.desc: Dreamy wants to encounter beings from outer space so much that no one believes him when he talks of having met one. Yet the arrival of this extraterrestrial is going to wreak havoc in the Smurf Village...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - One Good Smurf Deserves Another: Handy Smurf has saved Clumsy from a horrible fate. Clumsy swears eternal devotion to his savior and does his best to repay his debt… With awkward results. A clever scheme is needed to stop Clumsy's well-meant catastrophes...

programme.title: Revenge Of The Smurfs
programme.desc: A war is raging in the Middle Ages. Knights in armor in hot pursuit inadvertently destroy the Smurfs Village so a small band of Smurfs decide to avenge this wrongdoing. Won't Papa Smurf think this is too human-like a reaction?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Last Laugh: Gargamel has found a new diabolical scheme to get rid of the Smurfs: a glittering powder that is going to reduce them to helpless laughter...

programme.title: The A-Maze-Ing Smurfs
programme.desc: Jokey Smurf is dying to meet Melchior the Magnificent, creator of the famous Vanishing Box trick. Can Gargamel catch the Smurfs in Melchior's Amazing Maze?

programme.title: Smurf Van Winkle
programme.desc: Lazy Smurf is getting too lazy. The other Smurfs decide to play a trick on him: when he wakes up, he is surrounded by wrinkled, elderly Smurfs who tell him he has been sleeping for several centuries...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Sky Is Smurfing: Scaredy Smurf runs into the Village screaming about the sky being about to smurf down. And just at the same moment, Papa Smurf is beset by uncontrollable fits of sneezing...

programme.title: Turncoat Smurf
programme.desc: Would you believe Brainy Smurf is the one who led the evil Gargamel to the Village of the Smurf? Of course he did not. But the others suspect him...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Clumsy Smurfs The Future: What a strange stone Clumsy has unearthed! In it, he can see events that are going to happen... Yet knowing part of the future sometimes brings bad luck!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Blue Plague: Brainy Smurf has decided to dedicate himself to the wellbeing of his fellow Smurfs. He is going to cure them of all ills… With a little help from the evil Gargamel!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Mere Truffle: The Smurfs love truffles but truffles belong to the Trolls and the Trolls live under Truffle Troll Mountain, where in the shadows of the lake lurks the Thing with No Name...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa's Wedding Day: When the flower fairy Nymph arrives at the Smurf Village, all the Smurfs fall for her charm and wit. And soon they learn that she is to be some sort of Mama Smurf to them...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfs At Sea: Papa Smurf recalls Dreamy's exciting voyage on the high seas and his gripping adventures with sea turtles, whales, desert islands... and pirates!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - All's Smurfy That Ends Smurfy: Gargamel's theft of the Fairies' gold almost brings a state of war between the Fairies and the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Adventures Of Robin Smurf: The Smurfs' theatrical production of 'Robin Smurf' comes to life as the legendary hero is portrayed by a really good actor...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Tear Of A Smurf: A beautiful princess is turned into a hag and needs the whiskers of a cat and the tear of a Smurf for her magic potion. Azrael, Grouchy and Jokey unwittingly cooperate and as the magical transformation takes place, the princess frees them and they happily hurry home.

programme.title: How To Smurf A Rainbow
programme.desc: Mother Nature is too busy to conjure a rainbow for the Smurfs' festival, so Papa Smurf borrows her cookbook and mixes up the recipe himself. As there is no yellow available, they use the leprechaun's gold to produce a beautiful rainbow before Gargamel can steal it.
